name: Time Traveler: Escape Room VR
description: This Escape Room gives you the opportunity to embark on a journey through time, exploring the enigmatic world of the most famous characters in history, unraveling complex riddles and enigmas with clues you find along the way.

name: Threshold
description: Threshold is a short, dark and atmospheric First Person Exploration game picturing disturbing facts about an untold brutal story. Pick your country, start your shift and try to save the world with the help of your precious bucket, some Air Cans and a bunch of planks.

name: Thorgard
description: Thorgard is a minimalistic viking base defense game. Defend your sacred meadhall against enemies.

name: This is Normal
description: An educational game that teaches about Self Managed Abortion.

name: Thus Spoke the Donke
description: Thus Spoke the Donke is an immersive stealth-action game that casts you as a mercenary assassin. Customize your weapons and abilities, equip them according to your play style. Find the way to complete your mission either stealthily or through pure action with the help of personalized gameplay.

name: Tidy Cauldron
description: Help 3 messy witches tidy up their chaos! Arrange uniquely shaped mystical ingredients through 100 handcrafted puzzles in pixel art. Explore the esoteric arts of potion crafting, summoning, and tarot reading in this enchanting organization adventure!

name: Tiff and Tussle
description: An indie fighting game about rabbits and other rodents!

name: Throw Your Phone: Into The Ocean
description: As simple and as satisfying as it sounds, Throw your Phone! (Into the Ocean) A relaxing and meditative experience designed to calm your wild mind. With scored Arcade and open-ended Zen modes among multiple stunning & immersive environments.

name: Through the Thorns and Curses
description: This is roguelike deckbuilding game inspired by tabletop games. Start your journey and challenge yourself - became a stranger, build yours decks to explore, fight and collect treasures. Try to make your way through the Thorns and Curses!

name: The Zhukov Line
description: A short one-room-horror which takes place on a livestock train in a dystopian Soviet state.

name: The Yellow Moon's School: The Ghosts Day
description: The Yellow Moon's School: The Ghosts Day is a top-down shooter game in which you must shoot ghosts and destroy them to save the school.

name: The Wolf's Hunt
description: Third Person action game where you are a wolf trying to save your wolf cubs.

name: They Bite!
description: Dont just survive a zombie apocalypse, thrive in it! Blast hordes of Zeds as you gain experience and cash to buy better gear and see how long you can survive in a fun, low-poly setting.

name: ThirdPlace: Kon and Pon
description: A casual action game in which you control Pon, a raccoon dog, as he continues his journey up the mountain and beyond!You can change your character's appearance to make him more unique! Changechange" as often as you can to gain an advantage!

name: The Witch Veils: The Mansion
description: When two witches and an apprentice are kidnapped in a mansion, only Star, the apprentice, can save them and uncover what is happening.

name: The WereCleaner
description: Kyle is a Janitor. He's also a Werewolf. And now he's got the night shift. Fight for your life - and your paycheck - in a stealth-comedy game with surprises around every corner.

name: The Warehouse
description: A simple horror collection game set in a warehouse outside of space and time

name: The Wandering Demon Blade
description: An quick paced action story game drowned out by silence. Cut through with the demon blade all the while surrounded by the quiet of the world. Experience the short story following death.

name: The Ultimate Couch Game
description: A simple funny couch game to play with up to 9 friends! Enjoy competing to reach the end of the board through winning minigames whilst sabotaging your friends to increase your odds! Best with friends!

name: Theurgic
description: In this immersive, text-based RPG, you navigate complex social structures as an islander in a culturally tense setting. Delve into the lore and explore themes of identity, allegiance, and moral ambiguity in a story brought to life by the illustrations of artist Ori-Guy James.

name: American Truck Simulator: International LoneStar
description: This is a free update for American Truck Simulator that adds the LoneStar truck by International.

name: American Truck Simulator: Mack Anthem
description: It's time to discover an American legend. As one of the most significant new trucks in Mack’s 117-year history, the Anthem combines the latest innovations with more than a century's experience in truck-building.

name: Souhide Series: Omatsuri-zukushi
description:
The summer festival that everyone enjoyed is now available as an easy mini-game collection!

There are 4 mini-games: goldfish scooping, yo-yo fishing, sauce senbei split, and ring throwing, and if you clear it, an expert mode will appear in each game.

You can get lottery tickets according to the score you played, and you can collect the items you took in the lottery. In addition, if you clear certain conditions, a hidden game will appear, and you can enjoy it as many times as you want.

name: American Truck Simulator: Volvo VNL
description: Reliability, performance, and absolute driver satisfaction. This is why the Volvo VNL is an embodiment of excellence in the trucking world, and we are excited to let you know that brand new models have arrived in American Truck Simulator as a free update!

name: American Truck Simulator: Western Star 49X
description:
Debuting as Western Star’s latest model, the Western Star 49X brings together the latest in safety, technology, and driver comfort, as well as the brand's legendary build quality. Built to thrive in the most rugged of environments, on a heritage of toughness, the Western Star 49X will easily take on any challenge it comes across. See and drive this new legend first in American Truck Simulator!

The Western Star 49X for American Truck Simulator is now available with a huge number of chassis options, in both Set-Forward and Set-Back variants including 8x4 and 8x6 for heavy haul applications. The 49X also offers a choice of 12 engine and 7 transmission options (including the Detroit DD13/15/16 and DT12 transmissions), 3 cabin/sleeper sizes, and a large variety of customization options.

name: American Truck Simulator: Classic Stripes Paint Jobs Pack
description: Customize your truck and trailer with a choice of eight matching classic paint jobs! Achieve millions of color combinations to suit your taste with fully customizable color palette.

name: American Truck Simulator: Steering Creations Pack
description:
With kind cooperation of Steering Creations, Inc., we are introducing more than 50 unique alternate designs of steering wheels, carefully modelled to recreate the originals in full detail.

The purpose of Steering Creations is to provide comfortable, attractive, and personalized steering wheels to the trucking industry; dedicated to provide product which significantly improves the truck driver's daily traveling experience. This DLC shares the same passion - to bring the drivers a wide selection of physically relaxing and aesthetically pleasing steering wheels.

name: Dungeon
description:
Dungeon is a game made by Scott Cawthon in 2003.

The only image of the game shows the sprites of some enemies and objects, among which a zombie, a stone cross and a skeleton of what looks like a dragon or a dinosaur stand out.

name: Dinostria
description: Dinostria is a currently lost old Scott Cawthon Game also released in around 2003. From the few screenshots available, the game appears to be some sort of overheard dungeon crawler where you play as some sort of gold and silver knight.

name: Phantom Core 2
description:
Phantom Core 2 is a lost game made by Scott Cawthon sometime in 2003.

The only information about this game existing is an archive link that shows Phantom Core 2 next to the original Phantom Core. The game was labeled as beta, and it is unknown if a full game was ever made or released.

name: War
description: War is a lost Scott Cawthon game released in 2003. The game looks drastically different from Scott's other usual fantasy games at the time, where from the screenshots available, you appear to play as someone in a tank fighting in a battlefield.

name: Gunball
description: Gunball is another lost old Scott Cawthon game made in around 2003. Only 1 old screenshot of the game has been found and from it, it appears to be a space shooter very similar to Scott's other game Stellar Gun. Virtually nothing else is currently known about this game, accept that it was at least a bit bigger than Stellar Gun.

name: Ships of Chaos
description: Ships of Chaos is a lost old Scott Cawthon game made in 2003. It seems to be quite similar to Gunball and Stellar Gun, all being space shooters, except instead of it being a top-down shooter it seems to be left-right.

name: Elemage
description: Elemage is another lost old Scott Cawthon game that was made on February 10, 2003. The game actually has quite a few old screenshots available and from them, the game shows to be an RPG revolving around a blue-cloaked wizard fighting beasts in a medieval land.

name: Nerf: Superblast
description: Action-packed Multiplayer PvP Arena Shooter with realistic NERF Blasters. Ready for the ultimate NERF experience? NERF: Superblast brings the excitement of NERF battles to life in a fast-paced multiplayer FPS game! Dominate the arena with your friends and prove your skills in real-time PvP matches!

name: Flannville
description: Flannville is one of scott cawthon's many lost games. It was released in 2004 and is a action type of game.

name: Flannville 2
description: This game is a spin-off of the Legacy of Flan game series and sequel of Flanville.

name: Metroid: Ripped Worlds
description: Metroid: Ripped Worlds is a fangame created by Scott Cawthon on August 28, 2005.

name: The Misadventures of Sigfreid the Dark Elf on Tuesday Night
description: The Misadventures of Sigfreid the Dark Elf on Tuesday Night is an action game created by Scott Cawthon in 2006.

name: Light from Above
description: Light from Above is a canceled Christian MMORPG made by Scott Cawthon in 2006.

name: Weird Colony Online: First Strike
description: Sin descripción

name: Weird Colony
description:
Weird Colony is an online multiplayer game which players will choose a race, then build a city, join a community, and wage a long term war against players of opposing races.

There are three races to choose from: Robot, Flan, and Scarecrow. Robots are the technological race (of course). Flans are the magical race, and Scarecrows are the dark race. Each race has their own unique structures and attacks. Robots specialize in combat against other players and against monsters. Flans specialize in monster growing and are strong against enemy bases. Scarecrows specialize in base defenses, such as powerful turrets and traps.

name: Doomsday Picnic RPG
description: It's seems that your old childhood friend Josh has been holding a grudge against you for quite some time now. It has something to do with the fact that you pummeled him in video games as a child! Well now he's back for revenge! After crashing your picnic with some of your closest friends, not only has he created evil clones of them and you but he's always designed several twisted worlds designed after classic and torturous video games!

name: F1 24: Champion Edition
description: Join the grid and Be One of the 20. Drive like the Greatest in EA SPORTS F1 24, the official video game of the 2024 FIA Formula One World Championship

name: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree - Collector's Edition
description: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree - Collector's Edition includes the Elden Ring - Shadow of the Erdtree expansion code, a 46cm statue of "Messmer the Impaler", one of the key boss characters in Shadow of the Erdtree, an art book, and a download voucher for the original soundtrack.

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - 2024 Monster Energy Supercross Edition
description:
MX vs ATV Legends - 2024 Monster Energy Supercross Edition:
Compete like the pros on 16 official tracks from the 2024 Monster Energy Supercross Championship! All tracks are launching before the real world events.

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Launch Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon's Dogma II: Deluxe Edition
description: Dragon's Dogma 2 is a single player, narrative driven action-RPG that challenges the players to choose their own experience - from the appearance of their Arisen, their vocation, their party, how to approach different situations and more - in a truly immersive fantasy world.

name: Zaidan Houjin Nippon Kanji Nouryoku Kentei Kyoukai Kounin: KanKen DS
description: Sin descripción

name: Mighty Action Heroes
description: Mighty Action Heroes is a real-time multiplayer Battle Royale with an emphasis on fun, skill, and chaos! Collect weapons of varying strengths and duke it out in a cityscape inspired by classic action movie classics from the silver screen and beyond! Outmaneuver your opponents to be the last one standing in this fast and frantic isometric shooter.

name: Mountain King Return
description:
"It is tell than deep inside the Mountain lies the Golden Crown of a long forgotten king. No one knows the glory that awaits to the one who achieve to retrieve the crown to the peak of the Mountain.

But beware, the Mountain won't let anyone bring its darkest secrets to light."

Mountain King Return is a non-official sequel to the 1983 game by E.F.Dreyer, Mountain King released by CBS Electronics.

name: B99 Overclocked
description: Sin descripción

name: MediEvil: Resurrection
description:
A port of MediEvil: Resurrection, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

MediEvil: Resurrection is a 2005 action-adventure game for the PlayStation Portable and is the third installment in the MediEvil video-game series. It is a reimagining of the first installment in the series, MediEvil, with many alterations to the original structure and content, such as the addition of the "Anubis Stone" sub-plot which never appeared in the original. Many things such as level design and characters were changed drastically, and some levels from the original were removed altogether. New levels and characters were introduced, the cutscenes are completely original, and the game was given a much more comical, cartoon-like style as opposed to the Gothic horror-comedy of the original. The soundtrack is completely orchestrated, and half of the themes from the original were removed while new themes were created to fit with the new levels. Unlike the original, there is no alternate ending; Dan still goes to the Hall of Heroes regardless of whether he collects all of the chalices. The game also features a variety of voice talent, including Tom Baker as the narrator and the Grim Reaper.

name: Atta: Spot the Oddities in the Strange Hotel
description: Welcome to Room 1028 of the Despair Hotel! An attraction where you search for mistakes in the supernatural space Even if you suffer injuries so severe that they might kill you, it's okay You'll wake up in Room 1028 as if nothing happened Please enjoy to your heart's content until you're satisfied

name: Feathered Escape
description: Soar to freedom in Feathered Escape, a platformer where you, as a trapped bird, navigate challenging environments, overcoming obstacles and adversaries to reclaim the open skies.

name: Pico Dino
description: Pico Dino is a reimagination of Google Chrome's offline dinosaur game made in PICO-8.

name: Bureau of Contacts
description: Bureau of Contacts is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players where you confront insidious ghosts and the paranormal controlled by advanced generative AI technologies.

name: Genshin Impact: Blades Weaving Betwixt Brocade
description:
Version 4.5 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New character: Chiori
• New banner type: Chronicled Wish
• New character quest for Chiori
• New hangout event for Lynette
• New main event: Alchemical Ascension
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: Moon Buggy
description:
Moon-buggy is a simple character graphics game where you drive some kind of car across the moon's surface. Unfortunately there are dangerous craters there. Fortunately your car can jump over them!

The game has some resemblance of the classic arcade game moon-patrol which was released in 1982. A clone of this game was released for the Commodore C64 in 1983. This ASCII art version of moon-buggy was written many years later by Jochen Voss.

name: The Powermon Adventure!
description: The Powermon Adventure! is a Pokémon fangame made by Scott Cawthon.

name: Slumberfish!: Catching Z's
description: In Slumberfish: Catching Z's, your objective is to get the red beach ball to its goal by clicking the sea life around it. Orange and green fish can knock the ball back and forth, starfish throw the ball in different directions, ocean currents will carry the ball from one place to another, and eels and pufferfish can bounce it while granting access to new areas! Collect golden Z's while you navigate levels, as they can be used to purchase shortcuts and items!

name: Alboite
description:
Twitch game to play with your chat.
The streamer makes up a phrase and puts the words in a "box" without revealing them to viewers. Then viewers simply write words in the chat to gradually reveal the sentence and thus score points based on the number of words and the number of characters found. Score a max of points to win a game and climb the monthly ladder.

name: Snap-A-Game: Classic RPG
description: Make your own game! With Snap-A-Game RPG, you can snap together your own classic RPG within minutes! Put together your own enemies and NPC's using over 60 body parts and over 1,000,000 possible character combinations! Build your own customized weapons and weapon shops; draw your own overworld maps using tiles for grass, snow, sand, stone and lava; and interlink as many overworld maps as you want for almost unlimited game play possibilities! NOTE: This program is for entertainment purposes only and is not for professional game development. These games cannot be sold and contain copyrighted material.

name: Senbazuru
description:
A horror adventure novel that stimulates the imagination.
What do you pray for with a thousand paper cranes?

Senbazuru is generally known to be folded for "prayer". However, it is said that it has the aspect of a kind of obsession and a desperate wish...

The main character "Yuichi Sasaki" is an ordinary 26-year-old office worker. One morning, Yuichi receives a call from a hospital called Tsukumo General Hospital, which he had never heard of.

It seems that his lover, Mayuri, was transported the night before. He hurried to Tsukumo General Hospital, but...

A scenario where you can't predict what's next, a branching system with "cards" that determine the future of the story.

Let's complete various stories surrounding Yuichi and Mayuri.

name: 8-Bit RPG Creator: Zombies Attack!
description:
Put together your own enemies and NPC's using 90 body parts and over 10,000,000 possible character combinations! Build your own customized weapons and weapon shops; draw your own overworld maps using tiles for grass, snow, sand, stone and lava; and interlink as many overworld maps as you want for almost unlimited gameplay possibilities!

This Zombies Attack edition includes an additional 60 body parts plus the original 90!!! These 60 parts are of the undead variety (mostly)! In addition to the new parts, there are new tiles for the overworlds (INNs, shops, zombie medics), as well as animated tiles for water and snow! This pack also includes four new heroes- A baby, a smiley, a zombie, and a mage! You also get four new songs for customizing your game!

name: 8-Bit RPG Creator: Cuddly Creatures
description:
Put together your own enemies and NPC's using 90 body parts and over 10,000,000 possible character combinations! Build your own customized weapons and weapon shops; draw your own overworld maps using tiles for grass, snow, sand, stone and lava; and interlink as many overworld maps as you want for almost unlimited gameplay possibilities!

This Cuddly Creatures edition includes an additional 60 body parts plus the original 90!!! These 60 parts are of the cute and cuddly variety (mostly)! In addition to the new parts, there are new tiles for the overworlds (INNs, shops, medkits, ice cream), as well as animated tiles for water and snow! This pack also includes four new heroes- A baby, a smiley, a zombie, and a mage! You also get four new songs for customizing your game!

name: Squeen's Adventure: Definitive Edition
description:
A complete remake of the best game ever made! (don't look that up)

After Squeen's beloved spaceship suffers an oil leak, his ship loses control and crash lands onto the planet of Earth. Now while that wouldn't be so bad on its own, Squeen also realizes that his phone's battery is dangerously low! Help Squeen in finding parts all around the globe to repair his ship so he can get back to his home planet and charge his phone!

Remade from the ground up in the same engine that brought Squeen's Adventure 2 & 3 to life, Squeen's Adventure: Definitive Edition is a complete remake of the original Squeen's Adventure. Featuring brand new original assets, brand new sound effects, complete level remakes and reworks, a full achievement system, an original soundtrack, and a whole bunch more, this is the absolute definitive way to play a Jupitr Entertainment classic!

name: The Scrolling Enigma
description: Solve riddles, decipher cryptic messages, and piece together the fragments of an elusive truth. A one-hour unique escape game experience.

name: Echoes of the Emergent
description: In this Playdate-exclusive kinetic visual novel from the creators of Bloom, embark on a personal journey through a shattered post-apocalyptic world, where your pursuit for answers unveils the remnants of both a forgotten past and uncertain prospects for the future.

name: For Home
description: In "For Home", embark on an intimate RPG adventure through space and time designed exclusively for Playdate. As Satsuki, traverse star systems, gather resources on planets, and fight Sentinels in turn-based action combat. Caught between personal aspirations and distant connections, unravel Satsuki's heartfelt journey of loss, love, and self-discovery.

name: Diora
description: Sin descripción

name: Comet
description: A light-hearted puzzle adventure where you play as the exuberant Stella who confronts her fear of the dark to search for her brother.

name: The Whiteout
description: Sin descripción

name: Tegzer
description: A demake of Japan's best selling action game Thexder in PICO-8.

name: Grombcross
description: A picross game for the Dallas Society of Play! Each of the standard puzzles is a different piece of DSOP lore. There are also a variety of bonus puzzles included that are completely random.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Laugh Floor
description: The 9th free update for Dreamlight Valley brings the Monsters, inc Realm, Mike Wazowski and Sulley as Villagers, the Lovely Monsters Star Path, an expansion to Scrooge's Shop and new items on the Premium Shop.

name: Night Hike
description:
Night Hike is the second entry in the Senbazuru, or Thousand Paper Cranes, series. In the darkness, an unknown fear attacks you.

"Night Hike'' is an outdoor program that increases people's tolerance for darkness, senses they don't normally use, and a sense of solidarity with others by walking on mountain trails at night without lights.

Keita Iizuka, a budding reporter, is drawn to the unfamiliar term "night hike" and joins an outdoor tour in a deserted camp on the outskirts of the Tokyo metropolitan area.

Scenarios branch through a "choice card" system. An immersive sound production stirs your imagination. In the darkness filled with anxiety and fear, will you be able to welcome the morning again?

name: The Legend of Zelda: The Minish Cap Randomizer
description: A randomizer mod for The Legend of Zelda: The Minish Cap

name: The Devil's Route
description:
Its late at night and you are driving a bus.
What could possibly go wrong...

This game features a total of 6 endings.
Collecting all endings can take between 30 and 45 minutes

name: OoT3D Randomizer
description: A randomizer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time 3D.

name: Majora's Mask 3D Randomizer
description: A randomizer for Majora's Mask 3D on the Nintendo 3DS

name: Ufo snowboard
description: Interstellar snowboard odyssey across comic worlds! Dynamic weather, day-night cycles, breathtaking landscapes, plus online survival races with others.

name: Grand Theft Houso
description:
Sleek crime requires a sharp mind. There are only a few pieces of the puzzle standing between you and a wad of cash.

Miniature puzzle heist made in flickgame.

name: Trivia Beta64 Party
description: A Modification of Jackbox Games' Trivia Murder Party 2 - Inspired by the lore and community of Beta64, featuring overhauled voiceovers, music, trivia, and graphics.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Premature Release
description: A vertical slice of an unofficial and unfinished PS2 era-styled Ratchet and Clank fangame that will likely never reach completion.

name: MacGolf
description: A golf sport simulator on the classic Macintosh.

name: Egg RTX
description: Experience one of the games of all time like never before with Egg RTX. Fully remastered for next gen performance, Egg RTX includes raytracing and advanced shadows, never before seen in a game about eggs!

name: Erdluitl: Legends of Below
description: Erdluitl - Legends of Below is a 2D RTS inspired by Dungeon Keeper and old school titles from childhood. Dig and build dungeons, attract new creatures, manage population, train warriors and wizards, discover spells and assault your enemy !

name: Jimmy's Fruity Adventure
description: Mom is out shopping and Jimmy is about to lose his shit.

name: Symbol of Sacrifice
description: After experiencing a devastating event, three young siblings find themselves at the center of a struggle between two civilizations that could spell disaster on a global scale. A sacrifice must be made — one that will reshape the entire story and events that unfold. Who will you choose to sacrifice?

name: Arcanum Fortuna
description: Arcanum Fortuna is a tarot-inspired roguelike deckbuilder set in a mystical world of wonders. Explore various enchanting regions, meet a compelling cast of characters and keep an eye on your fate during card battles with a unique karma mechanic.

name: Octopus Goulash
description: Explore a futuristic metropolis, interact with a population of NPCs, and experience a unique narrative. Engage in dynamic missions, battle between flying cars, and shape your story in this interactive world where every choice is an opportunity, every moment an unparalleled adventure!

name: Conquering Ciros
description: Conquering Ciros is an action rogue like with a dash of strategy. You play as Nilvor, a reborn lich learning about what happened to his kingdom and his place in this new world. Fight off hordes of enemies while unlocking new crystals, synergies, and upgrades. Regain what is rightfully yours.

name: AC Sailing
description: Experience high-tech sailing with AC Sailing. Foil and maneuver the latest generation yachts in fast-paced online multiplayer races against top sailors worldwide. Master your skills for victory in this thrilling game.

name: Feather Trail
description: Identify real-world bird species through timing-based minigames while exploring an open world of pixel habitats. Build your life list & compete with local birders. Conduct field research & master ornithology. Adventure off-trail into the backcountry. Build a cozy campsite to return to each evening!

name: Lost in Translation: Silly
description:
Lacking memories and a purpose you take control of a recently awakened Resident inside Traumathos, the hereafter world. Your goal: fight your inner demons and face your past. Investigate the Sorrow's Polis, find your way through The Shyness Forest, and mostly important: unveil a mysterious language known as Murmure. Remember, you will die, true redemption requires sacrifice.

Lost in Translation: Silly is an investigation game with turn-based combat and bullet hell elements. Despite being an RPG at its core, the game has different mechanics depending on which plane of existence is being explored.

name: G-Mode Archives 13: Rinji Shuuden
description:
The third entry in the Senbazuru series. A strange event that attacks a passenger on a mysterious train...

"No... I remember seeing the last train running leaving me behind.

After that... That's right... The next train of the last train came into the platform. On the destination panel ... it said "Temporary last train."

A few passengers boarded the last train on a certain line at midnight. The scenery wrapped in darkness. A strange unmanned station. Hydrangea flowers that emerge on the night after the rain in early summer.

The mysterious atmosphere and the fear of not being able to reach the original world are there...

The third game of the Senbazuru series. Can you get through this fear...!?

name: Anime Girls: Sun of a Beach
description: Brave beach girls battle crab-like monsters! Choose your anime girl, arm up, and defend the shores by shooting down crabs in epic battles against the deep sea!

name: Rosetta
description: In this game, you can turn the foreign vocabulary you know (and that you didn't know until five minutes ago) into your power. Defeat the powerful enemies coming like a tide and survive tenaciously.

name: Book-Warm
description: "Book-Warm" is a cartoony action-roguelite featuring fluid and various gun-combat. You can dive in to universes of famous books and rewrite their stories with our own choices. Fight the villians in the books and rewrite the story as you wish to make children books great again!

name: Divine Journey 2: The Five Books of Moses
description: Embark on an immersive journey through the foundational stories of the Bible in "The Five Books of Moses," the captivating sequel to Divine Journey: The Life of Jesus. Explore the epic tales of these ancient texts, encountering miracles, laws, and the divine guidance that shaped a nation.

name: My Adventure Book
description: Join the amazing adventure! Explore a magical world, solve puzzles, find objects and help local creatures. You will complete this game in 5 minutes!

name: The book by the blue
description: in this First-person horror game you will be discovering what's going on with missing persons and a corrupt scientist. Find items littered around to access locked doors and secret passages.

name: The Book of Good
description: Play as Yvonne in this first-person, single life horror adventure. There are no second chances. Complete the tasks her mother started and be careful--stay alive! Find the Book of Good and what it means. Get out of the house as soon as possible!

name: 1000 Cuts: Jomaku
description: A samurai-inspired pixel-art side-scroller with simple-yet-satisfying combat, deeply consequential choices, and lore-rich storytelling. Hack and slash your way through the infamous Army of One-Thousand and reclaim your rightful place as daimyo, one cut at a time.

name: 100 Aliens Cats
description: 100 Aliens Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the Aliens themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of aliens places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: 100 Istanbul Cats
description: 100 Istanbul Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the Turkiye themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of Istanbul places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: 100 March Cats
description: 100 March Cats - Join the cutest adventure in the Lovely themed locations full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of romantic 8 march places and Cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: 100 Dino Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Dino Cats. Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: 100 Robo Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Robo Cats. Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: 100 Pirate Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Pirate Cats.

name: 100 Ninja Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Ninja Cats. Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: 3D Puzzle: Old House
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house

name: 3-byou Banana
description: This is Banana!

name: Abyss
description: Explore the abyss!

name: Abyssal Reflections
description: Abyssal Reflections is short Atmospheric depressing "non-jumpscare" game where you go through a total of 8 different time periods. You'll have to take care of your owners and how you relate to them is up to you.

name: Abyss Seeker
description: Recipient of the RPG Maker FES Official Event Grand Prize. This RPG involves character growth and quest progression as you seek treasures hidden in the 'Grand Labyrinth,' aiming to reach the deepest part of the dungeon.

name: Abyss Signal: Expedition
description: Since ancient times, there have been legends about an underwater civilization hidden from the eyes of people in the abyss of the Ocean. The stories would have remained legends until a strange artifact fell into the fishermen’s net, indicating that we are not the only intelligent beings.

name: 8AM
description: "8AM" is a suspense game where you find yourself trapped in a room, watching a family through cameras. Without explanations, you must decide if strange events occur night after night. Being correct extends the time, seeking your release by 8:00 a.m.

name: 9Cat Saga
description: 9Cat Saga is a sci-fi cross-platfrom action-adventure in space, following a band of 9Cats seeking to shoot, loot, craft and dodge roll their way trying to find the source of a mysterious space virus spreading across the 9Metaverse. Take everything into your own paws or take the help of your band!

name: 9 Kings
description: 9 Kings. 9 cards. 9 tiles. In this pocket roguelike strategy game, you have to build a kingdom powerful enough to withstand the other king's invasions and be crowned the king of kings.

name: Absolute Insanity
description: Armed with a diverse arsenal of weapons battle through ever-changing mazes and confront eerie, evolving enemies in a pulse-pounding survival horror action-packed experience.

name: Accurate Shot
description: Become an ace archer! Stretch the bowstring, aim and shoot! Control the arrow and hit all the targets on your way! Many exciting levels of varying difficulty await you! Whether you can pass this test is up to you!

name: Action Fubuki
description: Action Fubuki is a beat'em'up with a fast paced gameplay. You are Fubuki Goro, a kunoichi which use both martial techniques and special techniques to fight. The game is accessible to all as it require only a keyboard and a mouse.

name: Aeris
description: Complete challenges or fly freely all around the world!

name: Afterworld
description: Join the realm of Afterworld. Save animals, help spirits, and stop the destruction of the realm.

name: AimRogue
description: AimRogue is the roguelike that tests your aim. Use your cursor to blast through waves of targets as you stack upgrades and create absurdly broken builds.

name: Alcatraz
description: I was surprised to end up in Alcatraz. Having the best lawyer, I had hoped to be acquitted. But all his efforts to get me acquitted were in vain. My sentence screamed: "Welcome to hell, son." And so I found myself among thieves, murderers and rapists.

name: AkeriaTD
description: Classic tower defense game where you upgrade your towers. Get proficient in fighting specific mobs and make your heroes stronger.

name: Alchemy of the Earth
description: Explore the dreamscape of an alchemist. Uncover his attempts to use alchemy to bring back the dead. Survive in a doomed world, where the alchemist's failed experiments linger behind, guarding his abandoned secrets.

name: Alian
description: This is a normal shooting game. There is nothing extra in it.

name: Alex Hill: Whispers at White Oak Inn
description: Ever since a young woman died near the White Oak Inn, strange things have been happening. Now, her spirit roams the inn, and an employee is receiving strange letters. What dark secrets wait to be found? The clock is ticking and you, as Alex Hill, must uncover the truth before it’s too late.

name: Aletheia: Return of Odysseus
description: Embark on an accurate retelling of Homer’s Odyssey. A classic-inspired CRPG that puts you in control of Odysseus during his return home from the Trojan War. The game features turn-based combat, detailed character creation, choices and consequences, and a faithful depiction of Homer's Greece.

name: PalmRide: After Flight
description: Prepare to take flight in the retrofuturistic PalmRide universe. Explore neon cities, colorful mountains, beaches and more while shooting your way through a world full of enemies who want to kill you. Enjoy an on-rails shooter with retro outrun aesthetics!

name: Terminus: Ultiverse
description: Terminus introduces a cast of AI-powered Non-Player Characters (NPCs) unlike any before. Each character possesses a fully integrated worldview, allowing for deeply meaningful interactions and conversations that branch into multiple paths, each influencing the game's progression and possible endings.

name: Rise of the Eternal
description: Rise of the Eternal is a 2D-side scroller developed in Unreal Engine 5. It has beat'em up aspects and boss battles. In Early Access players have access to the first level of the game as well as one enemy type.

name: Manzaka
description: Manzaka is a fun action rpg focus on melee combat and interesting mechanics! Customize your character with different passive skill tree options and blast enemies through levels...

name: Quantum Void
description: Lost in an unexplored star system after a dimensional anomaly dispersed your fleet, you pick up signals scattered throughout the system. Explore the wrecks of your fleet vessels, collect useful modules for your ship, discover the secrets of the anomaly, and try to escape from this star of doom!

name: Photons
description: Photons is a co-op horror game for a group of players. In total environmental blindness, your goal is to explore diverse cave systems and maintain local machinery with the support of various tools. Be aware - you are not alone.

name: Street Totochèr
description: Street Totocher aims to showcase Reunion's culture and rich cultural diversity through a fighting video game.

name: Car Detailing Cleaner Simulator
description: Become the ultimate car detailing expert! Meet customers with dirty cars and transform their vehicles into sparkling clean havens. Are you ready to make every ride shine? Take on the role of a car cleaning guru! Dive into a realistic car salon cleaning simulation on Steam.

name: Pyrocast
description: An exciting 2D adventure game in which the player takes on the role of a pyromancer who has the powerful ability to create and control fire.

name: Collect Call
description: A puzzle platformer about cooperating and exploring.

name: Melon Madness
description: A relaxing and engaging fruit merge game! Combine fruit without spilling any out of the box, and try to get the highest score! Play alone or with a friend, in coop mode.

name: Minute Fighter
description: A first-person shooter controlled entirely with the mouse, with a focus on the granularity and minutia of interaction.

name: Path of the Djinn
description: Fight your way through the scorching desert of Samsara and stop the Djinn in this roguelike adventure! Save water, build your travel deck, and enhance your party skills through the game's unique skill perk system to prevail in turn-based combats!

name: Headwaters
description: A short fishing game early in development :-). Collect fish population samples for WDOE as you rebuild a once great public transportation network with the help of your new REALLY REALLY cool bird friends. Also unlock a bunch of new areas, fishing rods and upgrades!

name: Memories Off: Yubikiri no Kioku
description: Sin descripción

name: Memories Off #5: Togireta Film
description: Sin descripción

name: Memories Off: Sorekara
description: Sin descripción

name: Memories Off 6: T-wave
description: Sin descripción

name: Omoide ni Kawaru Kimi: Memories Off
description: Sin descripción

name: Memories Off
description: Sin descripción

name: Memories Off 2nd
description: Sin descripción

name: I Know Your Address
description: A collection of five short, silly games, following in the footsteps of those cheap games you impulsively gift to a friend and then immediately forget about. Speaking of which, I think I found the perfect gift for anybody whose address you know...

name: Expedition Astra
description: Explore the uncharted territories of the Kuiper Belt in a deeply immersive virtual reality experience. Hone your skills in spacecraft docking, engage in strategic asteroid sampling, and unveil the secrets of this distant region of our solar system.

name: The Otter Ways
description: Humans left this place long ago. Now you, an inquisitive otter, must survive there, among the ruins of their kingdoms.

name: Bonanza Burger
description: Bonanza Burger: Build, manage, and compete! Design your restaurant, hire a top-notch team, and battle rival managers. Conquer challenges, expand, and prove you're the ultimate fast-food mogul!

name: Kudamono Party
description: Get ready for a fruit-fueled adventure! In this fast-paced puzzle game, launch and align fruits to rack up points and rise in the global ranks. With vivid graphics and engaging gameplay, it's a race against time to become the top fruit master. Dive in and challenge the world!

name: Project Scar
description: Project Scar is a platform game and Endless Runner, enemies and platforms are randomly generated. Control Scar in his endless escape and quest to escape the Goblins grand jungle.

name: Dungeon Settlers
description: A colony sim based dungeon crawler where you manage your clan to build a settlement in barren land, provide food and shelter for your people, lead them deep into the merciless dungeon, overcome challenging combat by your strategy.

name: I Commissioned Some Snails
description: I paid artists to hide snails and lettuce in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: OG Memory: Winter 2K23
description: OG Memory: Winter 2K23 is an casual memory game with cute dog images. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. your best round will be count and always be displayed in game, to compare your rounds. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: Moto Rally Racing VR
description: This is a racing type vr game that takes you in a real motorcycle race. In the game, you will compete with other racers and feel the excitement and passion of speed in the virtual reality world. By using the joystick controller, you can fully control your motorcycle, including direction and speed.

name: DeepSea Serenity: VR Underwater Trip
description: This is a realistic VR visual experience game in which you play as a beautiful woman who freely travels through the magnificent underwater world.

name: Opaldune
description: A scifi third person survival horror. Stranded in the farthest reaches of space, Dr. Belica Gale boards the Opaldune seeking help. But in the bowels of the ship, monsters are prowling. Slip through dark hallways to scavenge for supplies, solve puzzles, and evade enemies long enough to get back out.

name: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Cars
description: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Cars is an hardcore puzzel game with cars in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Pryzm
description: A survival adventure mystery with turn-based combat and escape parameters that change with every new 1 to 2-hour run. A visual novel that can be played like a speedrun.

name: Rock Climbing?
description: It's a difficult game but it should be easier than real rock climbing.

name: Dawn of Gray
description: Dawn of Gray is a single-player visual novel with a distinctive style, in which you play the role of a young man discovering himself and his feelings.

name: Chicken Tale
description: Platformer game Chicken Tale with a touching story and pixelart graphics three difficulty levels so that both beginners and experienced players can enjoy

name: Frisson
description: A single-player press start to play arcade game with an unlockable story, branching paths, achievements, and high-velocity audio-visual gameplay, set to an infinite-runner sci-fi vapor core.

name: Chrome Valley Customs
description: Help save the garage by restoring classic cars to their former glory with a wide range of customization options! Work on your mechanic skills: repair, restore, paint, upholster, and finish the cars in the way you like best. To get the parts you need you’ll have to solve puzzles with explosives. What a business model!

name: Dreadweave
description: Immerse yourself in a horror extraction shooter where you must escape a Soviet ghost town with a monster from an upside-down world tracking your heartbeat. Arm yourself, gather resources, and fight to survive. Death is just the beginning—it's your gateway to an inside-out reality.

name: The Girl Under The Tree: Anna
description: Survival horror, exploration, puzzles, zombies, and mystery.

name: Factory Islands
description: Organize the blocks on this island correctly to complete the factory and ensure that the ores reach their destination. Relax as you use your logic to create a functional path using conveyors, tunnels, splitters, presses and furnaces.

name: Folie Fatale
description: All capture targets are mentally "Jirai"(landmine)!? Meet these eccentric boys, reveal the truth beneath in this Psycho-love-horror VN!

name: Story of the Lost Dot
description: Experience the classic tale of Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland in a whole new way.

name: Evostrike
description: A Roguelike tactics game where you fight hordes of aliens. Your Units evolve and learn new skills as the fight goes on. Manage your squad of 5 specialised mercenaries, and fight a never ending war against the infestation.

name: MechDrachen
description: Dive into non-stop action in a movement-based arena shooter, blending some of the most familiar gameplay elements of the genre into a completely new experience, build around the idea to have the most fun with your friends you could possibly have with a movement shooter.

name: The Backrooms: Unseen Tapes
description: "The Backrooms: Unseen Tapes" is a first-person survival horror game where you navigate a maze-like, ever-changing procedurally generated environment. With stealth, speed, and strategy, evade monsters and conserve limited resources to maintain your sanity and escape this nightmarish dimension.

name: Shotgun Chicken
description: Shotgun chicken is a Foddian Precision Platformer Where you use your trusty old shotgun to make it back to the chicken coop but just one wrong move can send you tumbling down to the bottom.

name: Corrupted
description: Corrupted immerses players in a haunted mansion, providing a suspenseful exploration of its eerie past. Combining psychological and survival horror, the game offers a truly chilling experience with elements such as exploration, puzzle-solving, resource management, and combat.

name: CEO Fish
description: Community-centric, realistic fishkeeping simulator where you sell fish and grow your business with the community and friends!

name: Money Maker
description: Embark on a journey to build the greatest empire ever known by simply clicking your mouse. Your goal is to amass as much wealth as possible, and you'll do so by starting small and gradually expanding your empire one click at a time.

name: DinnerDinnner
description: "DinnerDinner" is a horror adventure game set in the modern era. You become a diner staff member and encounter strange events - customers with bizarre stories, engaging in trivial conversations, and discussing incomprehensible matters.

name: Archie's Ribs
description: Archie is a little dog on a big adventure. His favourite food is Ribs but he can't have them until they are cooked. Your mission is to pass the time by having fun, taking naps and finding his second favourite food, NugNugs. A game filled with mini games & adventures. Will you help him get his Ribs?

name: Horse Racing Manager
description: Build your legacy in the horse racing world. Breed the next champion, making key decisions on training the horse and choosing its diet. Every choice counts, and every race tells a story. Create your own rags-to-riches journey, from being a stablehand to owning the greatest racing stable in the game.

name: Survive In Strange World
description: Action adventure strategy game with tower defense, in a fantasy world, use your own combat skills, weapons, and the power of your partners to survive. Face the ultimate fate with your unique combat style.

name: Ducks in a Row
description: Help Mama Duck navigate parks, factories, and more in this super cute puzzler, and bring all her baby ducks home!

name: Kill AI
description: An RPG with multiple endings written by AI. All interactions with the player that are in the game show the real attitude of the evil AI towards a person.

name: Theory
description: "Theory" is an intense first-person shooter (FPS) game set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by hordes of ravenous zombies. Players find themselves in a vast, desolate landscape. As a survivor, you'll navigate through various environments.

name: Into The Unknown
description: In a small city, a man was struggling to save his business from failure. Despite his best efforts, he was unable to find a solution. One day, while searching for a document in his room, he stumbled upon a dusty book that he had never seen before. The title of the book was “Into The Unknown”.

name: Death's Web
description: "Death's Web" is a challenging "Rogue-lite" platformer where you explore an ever-changing 2D world filled with enemies ready to slay you. Numerous curses are waiting to be discovered; they may lead to your demise, but perhaps they're valuable.

name: Medieval Questionnaire
description: Medieval Questionnaire is an educational game that tests your knowledge of medieval times with true or false questions.

name: Loop Theory
description: Loop Theory is a horror game in which every minute spent in the game changes your idea of the story. Take on the role of a character with a mysterious past and find out about what happened.

name: Dump The Corpse
description: It's a puzzle game, an action game, and a dark humour game that mixes a lot of gameplay. The game focuses on a housewife who is oppressed by life, since she married a husband who can't make money, her life is incredibly bad, so she can make the choice to kill him.

name: The Bathrooms
description: You awake near a foggy, deserted school with no memory of what happened. You soon discover a horrible secret and descend into a realm of cold, endless halls. Beware—The Custodian is watching you. Your escape from this nightmare depends on your wit and skill.

name: Forsaken Frontiers
description: Step into the frozen unknown in Forsaken Frontiers, a cooperative analog horror adventure set in the unforgiving embrace of an everlasting winter.

name: Soulivion II
description: ​Soulivion II is an immersive fantasy role-playing game with an in-depth demonic companion. Dominate the afterlife and decide the fate of everything.

name: NightCrawler
description: Enter the world of NightCrawler! NightCrawler is a wave-based FPS in a semi-voxel style. Dash through the night where you battle zombies, werewolves, ghosts, and reptilians from outer space!

name: Pixel Puzzles Trivia
description: Pixel Puzzles Trivia is an informative question questing puzzle game.

name: Rat Race
description: Engage in a top-down rhythm puzzle game with a built-in level editor. Unravel the Rat Race mystery, find freedom, and save your fellow test subjects. Evade blasts, lasers, and fallen test subjects. Create, and share unfair level designs with your friends through steam.

name: Mi Espada
description: This is a Survivor-like sandbox game inspired by the Three Kingdoms. Setting your build and upgrading weapons to drive off the tide of enemies. Your favorite generals are waiting for you to unlock. Let's jump to this impracticable Three Kingdoms and be an unstoppable general.

name: Codename: Nanxiangzi
description: Codename: Nanxiangzi is a strategy playing game self-developed by SparkNexa Studio.

name: Kamihi yori: Tokiori-hen
description: Sin descripción

name: Loong
description: "LOONG" is a dragon as the theme of the snake game, you will choose different styles of dragon civilization, through the snake to create the dragon totem.

name: Soul Warden Professional Academy
description: Soul Warden Professional Academy is a simulation management and tactical strategy game. Here, you will rebuild a desolate combat academy, recruit and train professional soul wardens Lead them to break through their limits in various combat styles and reach the pinnacle.

name: Neon Runners
description: Select a runner with special abilities, create a power-up deck, and race! Craft your custom tracks using a user-friendly map editor. Explore various game modes such as Co-Op, Boss Battles, Floor is Lava, and Puzzle Rush. And it's free! Play cross-platform on PC & Mobile.

name: Mary's Arcade: Service Pack
description: Mary's Arcade: Service Pack is a complete visual and technical rework of Mary's Arcade

name: Ommatophilia
description:
Ommatophilia is a surreal horror game in development about angels. You play as the Angel Cakes, a girl trying her very best to be happy with her friends despite her circumstances.

Explore the world of Ithal with your companions as you prepare to say farewell to Blue, an angel who will soon undertake Departure. Talk to several angels, solve puzzles, and meet those who do not have faces.

Come to Ithal, dear player! Embrace the eyes. Learn to say goodbye!

name: Real Estate Simulator
description:
Embark on an exhilarating journey to build your real estate empire in "Real Estate Simulator," a deep and dynamic business simulation game. Begin as a small-time property investor and strategize your way to become a tycoon in the cutthroat world of real estate. Navigate market trends, negotiate deals, and outsmart competitors in this immersive simulation experience.

Interactive NPC Negotiations: Engage with a range of NPC clients, from cautious first-time buyers to wealthy investors. Understand their needs, negotiate terms, and close deals that shape your path to success.

️ Property Development and Management: Purchase, renovate, and sell properties across the city. From cheap living areas to luxury skyscrapers, each property brings unique challenges and opportunities.

Intuitive Controls and UI: Whether you're a seasoned tycoon or new to business sims, intuitive controls and a clear user interface make managing your empire accessible and enjoyable.

Unique Challenges and Achievements: From market crashes to VIP clients, face unique challenges that test your strategic prowess. Unlock achievements and make your mark in the world of real estate.

name: Reversi
description: Take turns putting your pieces in the 8x8 square and get more of your pieces on the board than the opponent's pieces.

name: Dice Blaze
description:
Dice Blaze - 1v1 Turn-based Combat game

Immerse yourself in strategic battles, unleash powerful abilities, and master the art of the dice.

Dive into a world of strategy and chance, where epic battles, cunning tactics, and thrilling adventures await.

name: Age of Wonders 4: Primal Fury
description: Harness the power of nature in the Age of Wonders 4: Primal Fury content pack. Channel the spirit of your favorite animal with the Primal culture, ride a mammoth or a crocodile into battle, and wield the powers of the Naga lords!

name: Full of Crap
description: Full of Crap is a card game. This game is a game of eating curry without poop while avoiding curry with poop. You watch their behavior carefully and eat a lot of curry without poop.

name: The Lord of Hexa
description: You are a medieval Lord who must construct a colony, complete challenges to expand the kingdom, and rule an hexagonal low poly world. Immerse yourself in a tranquil ambiance with soothing sounds and music in this minimalistic tile game!
A short and silly game made only on Feb 29 only for Feb 29.

name: City Connection
description: The NES port of City Connection, a 1-2 player comedic racing adventure platform game in which you control a car that can never be stopped. The object of the game is to drive through a series of cities and paint every part of the roads in each city as proof of your visit to that city. City Connection was remarkable for its time in that each location had its own background and music which was a variation on the main theme of the game. There are twelve locations: Manhattan, the Grand Canyon, Easter Island, Paris, Neuschwanstein Castle, London, Sydney, Egyptian temples, and cities in India, Holland, China and Japan.

name: Legendary Wings
description:
The NES port of Legendary Wings (Aresu no Tsubasa, "The Wings of Ares"), a fantasy-themed shoot-'em-up game released by Capcom as a coin-operated video game in 1986. The player takes control of a young soldier equipped with magical wings who must save the world from a malfunctioning supercomputer.
Legendary Wings is set in a distant future where an alien supercomputer named "Dark", which has been helping human civilization achieve a new state of enlightenment since ancient times, has suddenly rebelled against mankind. Two young warriors are given the Wings of Love and Courage by the God of War Ares in order to destroy Dark and ensure mankind's survival.

name: We are Football 2024
description:
Welcome to We Are Foorball 2024 – the new football management experience from the creators of the legendary On the Ball and EA Sports FIFA Manager Series! Dive into the world of football like never before. Choose an existing club or start your own. Manage either men or women, lead your club to new heights, and become the following manager legend!

Be there with your team on the pitch. In our immersive 3D game engine, you can directly influence the action on the pitch through instructional shouts. Simulate the same game a thousand times over, witness matches 50 years into the future or switch between games in conference mode on match day. Relive highlights, analyze goals, and enjoy a comprehensive season summary.

name: Xevious: The Avenger
description: The NES port of Xevious.

name: Return of the Slimepires
description: An action-adventure platformer where you play as a human that must get to the safety of the underground bunker. There are multiple endings depending on the path you take.

name: Picture Builder
description:
Picture Builder is a delight for enthusiasts of pixel art, color by number, puzzles, object finding, hidden objects, and other logical games and brain teasers. Within Picture Builder, you'll discover various cityscapes initially devoid of life. It's up to you to assemble all the elements of the picture, with each object or character representing a distinct puzzle piece. Since all puzzles are entirely unique, playing Picture Builder is always a joyful and intriguing game experience.

Each location unfolds before you in parts, requiring you to collect all objects to fill the city with interesting situations and characters. Your task is to find the correct fragments for each picture, enlarge objects, and utilize hints. In Picture Builder, you independently craft the city and its inhabitants, piece by piece. Puzzle-solving has never been this enjoyable. Install the puzzle game now and receive countless urban locations with an endless array of pixel puzzles.

name: Infinite Mario 64
description: What if you could play Super Mario 64... forever? A random level generator for Super Mario 64, using libsm64 and Godot Engine as a base.

name: Dea
description: Turn-based fantasy RPG that takes place in Lastia, the last piece of land on a world that survived a great war and is now facing a new threat: strange creatures named Xempts.

name: Five Unreal Nights at Candy's
description:
No company is without a rival.
Freddy Fazbear's New Pizzeria has closed for good. And so, another restaurant is going to take its place in the world of entertainment.
What could go wrong?

name: Endurance Motorsport Series
description: Manage the race from the stands, drive legendary cars and enjoy a genuine endurance race experience. As both driver and engineer, in this unique simulation victory can only come through teamwork.

name: Tour de France 2024
description: Win a Grand Tour and claim the yellow jersey in the official game of the Tour de France 2024. Beat your opponents, push yourself to the limit and show what you're capable of in the new multiplayer mode: Criterium.

name: Pro Cycling Manager 2024
description: Become a sports director, take part in the world's top cycling races and lead your riders to victory. Set race objectives, negotiate contracts, find new sponsors and build your team season after season.

name: Welcome to Paradize: Zombot Edition
description: Paradise isn't exactly what you hoped for: it's infested with zombies! Thankfully, you can control them. Capture them and teach them to farm or fight. They will help you defend your camp while you explore the world looking for… a new paradise.

name: Weedcraft Inc + Ruinarch: Devil Lettuce Bundle
description: Become an evil overlord or create a marihuana empire - Ruinarch + Weedcraft Inc

name: Dragon Ball FighterZ: Legendary Edition
description:
The Legendary Edition includes:
• DRAGON BALL FighterZ
• FighterZ Pass
• FighterZ Pass 2
• FighterZ Pass 3
• Android 21 (Lab Coat)
• Android 21 Unlock
• Commentator Voice Packs 1-4
• Stamps: Girls Pack
• Exclusive SS Goku Lobby Avatar
• 4 Extra Stamps

DRAGON BALL FighterZ is born from what makes the DRAGON BALL series so loved and famous: endless spectacular fights with its all-powerful fighters.

name: MXGP: The Official Game
description:
Players will be able to explore behind the scenes of the world’s most iconic motocross championship, with access to all the discipline’s official content – with the game providing calendar, riders, teams, bikes and sponsors.

The start of a new MXGP game series developed by KT Racing and published by Nacon, who has the rights for the franchise from 2024 to 2028.

name: Weedcraft Inc + Crossroads Inn: Weed and Greet Bundle
description: Build your own weed empire or create a fantasy tavern - Weedcraft Inc + Crossroads Inn

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: GT Racing Game Bundle
description:
GT Racing Game Bundle for Assetto Corsa Competizione.

Contents
Assetto Corsa Competizione Base Game.
ACC 2020GT World Challenge Pack
ACC British GT Pack:
ACC GT4 Pack:
ACC Intercontinental GT Pack:
ACC 2023 GT World Challenge Pack
ACC GT2 Pack:

name: Chef Life: Cooking Lab
description: Create your own recipes from thousands of combinations with the COOKING LAB pack, available as a free download! Use the lab to offer your customers your own unique cuisine.

name: Furniture: Build & Repair
description: Build, repair, and clean a variety of furniture at your own pace in a relaxing and cozy atmosphere...

name: Dragonkin: The Banished
description: In a world ravaged by dragons, play as four heroes, solo or multiplayer, and fight hordes of enemies, adapt your build with the unique Ancestral Grid system, improve your city, and share it with your friends.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai HD
description: Its a remaster from the original game enhanced and re-mastered in HD, alongside full Trophy and Achievements support, replacing all the original ost and adding Budokai Tenkaichi series soundtrack.

name: Terminator: Survivors
description: Play as a survivor in an open world set after Judgment Day where you, alone or in co-op, scavenge resources to build a base of operations for mankind. But you’re not alone. Skynet’s machines hunt you down as well as rival human factions.

name: Stowaway
description:
STOWAWAY is a short sci-fi point & click adventure about a lone survivor, a dead crew, and a nasty alien. Voice acting, items & puzzles.

"Star log 617.7 of the USS Starcross. Pilot Travis Walker recordin'. It appears I am the sole remaining crew member. Some unspeakable - thing - has boarded the ship on our last salvage run. Chief Engineer June Harley and Captain Ben Thomas are dead."

name: Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 3 HD
description: Its a remaster from the original game enhanced and re-mastered in HD, alongside full Trophy and Achievements support, replacing all the original ost and adding Budokai Tenkaichi series soundtrack.

name: Plantabi: Little Garden
description: Plantabi is a chill sandbox game where you take care of adorable plants and design the cozy little garden of your dreams!

name: Mystia
description:
The first 100-yen RPG series in the game market!

Let's become the main character Meena and go on an adventure! It is an RPG that depicts Meena, a magical swordsman living in a border village, growing up through adventure. We will go around the fields and dungeons to defeat monsters and explore tools and treasures while advancing the story. With a save function and a memo function that automatically saves even if the game is interrupted.

name: Hebi no Inochi
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Battle Polycars
description: Hop into the driver's seat in this modern old-school vehicle combat game! Fight for victory alongside your teammates in our Massive Online Vehicle Arena to put your driving skills to the test or spawn into Arena Deathmatch! DRIVE the fastest, DESTROY the competition, and DOMINATE.

name: In the Drink
description: Set on Christmas Eve, players take control of a deep-sea researcher and her trusty submarine to scour the depths and save aquatic creatures in need.

name: AquaLife 3D
description:
Create your own fascinating and realistic underwater world on your mobile device!
AquaLife 3D - it's a real live aquarium that you can take with you wherever you go!
With AquaLife 3D you can create attractive saltwater, freshwater and even fantasy aquariums as well as choose their inhabitants and decorate them. There are over 100 species of exotic fish, more than 100 decorations and items, a variety of backgrounds and aquatic pets. Your possibilities are endless!

name: Training Elves
description: You are an adventurer of some renown that has grown tired of adventuring. After losing almost all of your money gambling, you meet two elves that seek you out and put you to task of training them into adventurers. In exchange, they give you amorous nights.

name: Who Do You Want to Date? Professional Girls Collection
description: A confident policewoman, a tough military woman, a flirtatious tennis player, or a gentle artist? Or maybe someone else? Who do you want to date?

name: Lizards Must Die: Victor Character
description: New character - battle master and mercyless fighter - VIKTOR.

name: Scum: Vehicle Skins Pack
description: Introducing the SCUM Vehicle skins pack! This cosmetic DLC will let you customize your vehicles in many different styles so you can be unique on land, sea and air. 15 unique paint jobs to choose from, you can rest assured you can have your vehicle looking just as you want it.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: EKCH Airport
description: []EKCH[/b] ] as the principal international gateway for Copenhagen, Denmark. Ever wondered what's it like to be in the life of a Danish air traffic controller? Control at this airport add-on for Tower! Simulator 3, where on a busy day there are about 850 take-offs and landings.

name: Bounce ASMR: Triangle
description: Relax your brain with some geometric bouncing. Bounce ASMR is right here!
