description: An OL dressed in uniform pantyhose and high heels, returned to the rental room after a day's work and prepared a delicate dinner for herself. As she waits for her food to heat up, she stretches, presses her legs and wiggles her toes, as if waiting for her food to cook faster.

name: Foot Massage
description: The player plays the role of a foot masseuse. Every night to receive city beauties, provide foot massage services. Serve people and meet own little hobbies.

name: Foot Odor Girl
description: The heroine is a girl who likes sports. However, what is troubling is that after exercise, the stockings on her feet will be wet by sweat, giving out a unique smell.

name: Bounce ASMR: Circle
description: Relax your brain with some geometric bouncing. Bounce ASMR is right here!

name: Bounce ASMR: Pentagon
description: Relax your brain with some geometric bouncing. Bounce ASMR is right here!

name: Bounce ASMR: Hexagon
description: Relax your brain with some geometric bouncing. Bounce ASMR is right here!

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzle - Beautiful Nonsense
description: Take a Look into the mysterious window of Imagination with DLC "Beautiful Nonsense"

name: Hentai: Maid Madness
description: Embark on a captivating journey surrounded by regal charm in this alluring jigsaw adventure! Immerse yourself in the world of Maids, where you'll encounter a variety of stunning girls sure to captivate your imagination!

name: Seductive Shadows
description: Play as a student at Alfonso University, navigating a world of occult mysteries. Juggle with normal life and learn lustful supernatural abilities with the help of Sally, a Succubus. Manage intimate relationships and uncover secrets linked to your past, all while evading the Underworld's notice.

name: A Date with Death: Beyond the Bet
description: Extend your bet with the Grim Reaper himself and fall in love all over again in A Date with Death - Beyond the Bet! Create your own character, decorate your apartment, and chat away with the charming yet dangerous Grim Reaper through text and video calls.

name: WooLoop: Science Pack
description: Science GalleryThis Science-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Discover the inner workings of the world around us with this scientific pack!Wrap and weave images of a scientific nature!

name: Paper Dash: Invasion of Greed
description: Jump into "Paper Dash - Invasion of Greed," a relaxing escape into a world where your paper plane soars through levels shaped by human desires. Fly, glide, dash, scare away ghosts, and enjoy a peaceful journey, facing the ghosts of greed in abstract and beautiful environments.

name: Train Sim World 4: Edinburgh - Glasgow: Engineering Express Pack
description: Explore more gameplay on the ScotRail Express route, with newly liveried Class 66s joining ranks alongside the Class 385. From engineering movements to daring drags, expand your Edinburgh - Glasgow experience in Train Sim World 4.

name: Dating Simulator 2025
description: Dating Simulator 2025 is a dating simulator that offers you the skill of seduction and improving your dating skills. This game allows players to immerse themselves in a world where they can meet, socialize and win the hearts of virtual girls.

name: Locked in a Room While: Visiting an Old Castle
description: "Locked in a Room while" is a series of VR Escape Games. In "Locked in a Room while visiting an old Castle" You are locked in a room of an old castle. No one can hear you; this place seems isolated. Chill and relax, nothing is here to scare you. Find the solution to escape from this place.

name: Idle Spiral: Railway Pack
description: You will get the Railway Spiral as a new design.

name: The 6-Digit Computer
description: The 6-Digit Computer is a programming game in an alternate past. You, Deam Mead, just got hired at Farworks as a programmer for their new operating system, HTaeD / O6. However, it's not as simple as you might think! The computer operates on bijective senary, which means that it only has the digits 1-6. So 7 becomes 11, 24 becomes 36 and so on.

name: SurvivalScape
description: Venture into SurvivalScape, an exhilarating auto shooter bullet hell! Choose your hero from a roster of exciting characters, each with their own special abilities and playstyles. Battle through waves of enemies, collect crystals to level up your hero, and confront unique bosses. Can you survive?

name: Chura-jima Kurashi
description:
Blue sky... White sea... Deep forest... Who will you meet and how will they live their lives?
A mobile island living game where you can simulate life on a small island in the south.
Interaction with residents and as a mini-game
Through life and play in a recreated island country
Find out how to live on the player's own island
It's relaxing and a little strange. It's a mobile app.

name: Action Unreal Tournament 2004
description: Sin descripción

name: Jump Car
description:
Jump from platform to platform with your Jump Car! Time your jumps carefully and don't crash into the other cars.

How high can you climb?

name: Leapfrog 2-in-1 Leaptop Touch
description: Learn about letters, numbers, music and more!

name: The Tower
description:
Build the tallest tower in the world to reach the sky with a power of one-tap gameplay!

Beat your friends, unlock new towers, discover all locations.

name: Party Hard 2: Alien Butt Form
description: Something has been very wrong with parties in the city of Aho Bay recently. Who really controlled Party Hard Killer? Why it took so long for the police to catch him? Where are those tentacles grown from, for Christ’s sake? Find out in this brand new DLC, fueled by booze and hilarity.

name: Masked io
description: With forts that can intimidate any player, this location speaks for itself. You have to be fierce as your character jumps right into the action. Action as well as movement make the whole game look sharp and inviting. Your mind must be clear and free of worries. Like a soldier in combat, you get the rush of fighting and this particular game has the power to satisfy that.

name: Basic Replicator
description:
Boot up your replicator console, and get to coding!

In this game you are tasked with writing BASIC code to generate voxel objects. Each challenge presents you with a new object to replicate.

Attempt to optimize your solution to minimize program size, or executed instruction count.

name: Super Squishy Square Stacker
description:
Inspired by the likes of Not Tetris and C4D4U's "Satisfying Softbody Tetris" animations; this game sees you controlling jelly-like tetrominos, arranging them in such a way that clears rows, and draining the remaining residue with the two vents at the bottom of the field. Play ends once you've collected enough jelly to fill a container of variable size, depending on which mode you've picked.

The available containers hold a pint (~17 lines), a quart (~33 lines), and a gallon(~133 lines) each. Upon completion, you'll be shown your final time and score, allowing you to decide which to focus on.

name: That's Not My Neighbor
description: 'That's not my Neighbor' is a 2D Indie horror game based on the job simulator genre with an unique twist created by Nacho Sama.

name: Killing Time
description: A sophisticated shooter laced with gallows humor. Killing Time is no shallow grave. Its depth is well-conceived. Puzzle solving and strategic thinking are placed at a premium.

name: Center Station Simulator
description: Inherit an abandoned shopping center. Make it functional and produce many products yourself in your underground laboratory! Get rich by selling them to your customers. Develop and expand your center with many features!

name: FNaF: Project Lockdown
description: Dock to a space station with deadly animatronics and try to get out alive.

name: GachaPon!
description: Embark on a whimsical journey of physics-based puzzle-solving in the delightful world of GachaPon! Discover the art of relaxation as you immerse yourself in this charming game, where the goal is not just to solve puzzles, but to enjoy the process of being yourself.

name: Pincrediball
description: The Automata Pinball Wizard game! YOU design the machine and the Automata Pinball Wizard plays it to get a High Score. Earn medals to advance levels and build ever more extensive machines!

name: Buckshot Roulette
description: An unofficial Web Browser port of the game.

name: Project O.R.C.S.
description: Project O.R.C.S. is a multiplayer Collaborative Storytelling RPG where you work together with your party to create characters, craft quests, and tell stories. Building upon the magic of telling a story around a table with a group of friends, and evolving that experience into the online world. You can generate and start your session within minutes rather than hours. Whether you choose the role of Guide to facilitate the group’s journey or you join as an Adventurer and craft your dream character, you and your party collaborate to play a story only limited by your imagination.

name: Resident Evil
description:
The Sega Saturn version, released in July 1997, added an unlockable battle mode in which the player must traverse through a series of rooms from the main game and eliminate all enemies within them with the weapons selected by the player.

It features two exclusive enemies not in the main game: a zombie version of Wesker and a gold-colored Tyrant. The player's performance in the battle mode is graded at the end. The game's backgrounds were touched up to include more detail in this version. The Japanese version is the most gore-laden of all the platforms; after decapitating a crawling zombie with a kick, the head remains on the floor, and Plant 42 can cut the character before the game over screen; though the live-action footage is censored in the U.S. version.

The Saturn version also features exclusive enemy monsters, such as a re-skinned breed of Hunters known as Ticks and a second Tyrant prior to the game's final battle in Chris's game. Exclusive outfits for Jill and Chris were added as well.

name: Rayman Origins
description: Whilst mainly the same as the other versions of Rayman Origins, the PlayStation Vita version adds in something in the form of Relics.

name: Just Dance 3
description: The Wii version has Smart Shuffle, Speed Shuffle, and Non-Stop Shuffle, plus a Hold My Hand dance feature, where up to 8 players can share the 4 Wii Remotes and dance all together. It also features an exclusive “Just Mario”.

name: Marvel: Ultimate Alliance
description: These versions of the game do not featured Moon Knight and Collossus like the other versions do.

name: Soul Shifters: Online
description:
This is an exploration-focused game, so there's no predefined path to follow or a specific sequence of missions to complete; you are free to explore and discover its mysteries.
Face and absorb various daemons, open mysterious chests on the map, talk to NPCs. While there's no set mission sequence, some of them will open up new possibilities and paths for you.

name: 18titans
description: 18Titans game - Robin is the leader of the Teen Titans. He was abducted by Slade, who is one of the most dangerous enemies in the game. Slade takes a syringe and injects something into Robin's veins that have followed by a cryptic message. The teen superheroes find themselves in a difficult situation where they must save themselves if they hope to rescue society from Slade and his band of evildoers. It all begins with the abduction, but it doesn't have to end with the injection that very well could put an end to Robin's life.

name: Blades & Wands Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Trepidation
description: A co-op horror about searching the depths of the ocean for treasure.

name: Cucumber Champion
description: Embark on a journey as the valiant Cucumber Champion! Wield a cucumber as your mighty weapon and navigate through a fantastical world filled with quirky cats, humorous encounters, and epic battles. Can you prove yourself as the champion and save the day in this delightful and eccentric adventure?

name: Hours After Midnight
description: Dive deep into a roguelike survival quest against Rettam'diov, the Consumer of Worlds. Progress, earn experience, refine characters, and uncover potent tools. Face relentless hordes alone or amplify the thrill, teaming up cross-platform in our distinctive co-op mode.

name: Transpile Girl Rescue Operation!
description: You can fix her! Transform Hina from a cold, emotionless robot to your strict & ideal wife!

name: Sex Faculty
description: Sex Faculty is a visual novel for adults, where immersive storytelling and a sense of realism are complemented by a variety of scenes and elements intended for players over 18.

name: Evil Beneath
description: In this retro PS1/PSX style game. Play as a reporter (Rosa Salinas) investigating strange phenomenon regarding people mysteriously disappearing after visiting a particular mansion located deep inside a forest. During your investigation you will encounter horrifying creatures ready to tear you limb from limb and devour you alive. Traverse your way through these monstrous creatures and discover the terrifying truths about the mansion in the forest, while trying to make your escape before it's to late.

name: Terrorformer TD
description: Terrorformer TD is a tower defense roguelite where the map erodes and grows as the game progresses -- but the player gets terraforming tools to shape it! Every round, fortify your defenses to survive against waves of enemies; then cash in for new towers, upgrades, and other rewards. Gain XP and level up to unlock new abilities and components after each run and try again to make it even further!

name: Sex Campus
description: Welcome to the exciting world of SEX Campus, where freshman Nick embarks on an incredible journey through real student life. But in this college, every day is a new stage in the game 'Hot Pie,' where real-life quests are intertwined with fun and intriguing tasks.

name: Rockin' Racket
description: Rockin’ Racket is a narrative driven, fast paced, pop punk band management game with an undercurrent of teenage angst as you try to hold together a band of rowdy younger siblings, keep the crowd happy, and manage your frugal earnings while booking larger venues to rocket your band to stardom!

name: Punk
description: Punk is an action roguelike set in a mysterious open world with bullet hell combat and big emphasis on exploration. Fight your way through varied biomes, interact with diverse ecosystems and collect modules that you can use to customize your ship.

name: Sunflowers and the Goddess of Death
description: A classic style, story-driven RPG centered around a young woman determined to protect her people from fel beasts and the interminable greed of men, all while struggling against the manipulation of a goddess who seems to want nothing more than to paint the world a flowing crimson...

name: Wuilsafe
description: Wuilsafe is adventure game about exploration. Expand your world, explore a bunch of interesting mechanics. Play comfortably. Play the way you like. Play with blocks.

name: Chrono Recorder
description: "ChronoRecorder" is a 3D puzzle game. Players can manipulate time and gravity. And you have to use that ability to solve problems. You might think this game is difficult if you don't use your brain.

name: Diamonds Collector
description: The pursuit of wealth - How it feels?

name: Nono's Quest
description: Nono's Quest is a short casual 2D JRPG were you fight monsters and get in all types of trouble.

name: Demonic Astal
description: Demonic Astal is a 2D platformer where you as a brave demon hunter, go to the demonic world to find a magical portal. You must go down the floors in search of a portal, overcoming various obstacles and fighting dangerous creatures to become stronger.

name: Search of Magic Ore
description: Search of Magic Ore is a mixture of RPG and Rogue-like game, you find yourself in a vast location where your main goal is to complete the task and move further along the level. Go to the magical forest, eliminate as many enemies as possible and bring back magical ore!

name: Flawless Dream
description: A young man doomed to insomnia finally closes his eyes, but when he opens them again he finds himself in an astral world. The demon standing in front of him bargins to solve his sleep problem by sharing good memories. The devil is starving for mana crystals and he asks this young man to help him.

name: Moonflower: Fae's Rest Epilogue
description: The Moonflower is saved, but the love story burns bright. Continue the love story of Skylar and Ender in this epilogue after story.

name: MR 333 II: Planetbirth
description: Fight back entities and run from those they persuade as you seal the portal before MR 333 is given access to the world of your home.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: WWE DLC Pack
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: WWE

name: Isoland4: The Anchor of Memory
description: ISOLAND4 is the fifth installment in the ISOLAND series by CottonGame. The game continues to feature the distinctive hand-drawn style of CottonGame, with point-and-click gameplay. The game also features a second playthrough mode, which allows players to gain a deeper understanding of the game.

name: Tokyo Mafia Simulator
description: Tokyo Mafia Simulator is an simulation action-adventure game where you experience the thrilling and dangerous life of a yakuza in Tokyo. You can extort, steal, hit, protect, date, and more, as you rise through the ranks of the underworld.

name: Clockwork Ambrosia
description: Clockwork Ambrosia is a compelling steampunk fusion of metroidvania and a 2D shooter. Players pull on the boots of an airship pilot to combat an army of deadly robots and monsters. Experiment with a range of rule-breaking weapons modifications and armors to prevail through this wild adventure!

name: Zenith: Nexus
description: Fight, explore, and lose yourself in an anime-inspired world built for VR. Two action-packed game modes available. How will you use your power?

name: Drowned Memories
description: Drowned Memories is an upcoming narrative-driven game taking place in the late 1950s, when the federal capital of Brazil, Brasília, was being built. Based on real events, the game tells the story of one of the largest workers' villages called Amaury Village, which was flooded by the waters of the artificial lake Paranoá.

name: EXR
description:
Row your way, train with friends and join the world's biggest 3D rowing community.

Discover your passion for indoor rowing with EXR: row in virtual worlds, join events and race rowers from all over the world. Channel your inner rowing champion and grow stronger with every workout!

name: The Contact
description:
The Contact is a first-person horror game.
You have to look for something mysterious by relying on the phone number and location information found on the internet.

name: Car Racing Master: Car Game 3D
description:
Race Master 3D Car Racing is a furious, fast and fast racing game. If you love playing car racing games and are familiar with car driving games, try this car game and immerse yourself in the fun of car games in 3D. Play car racing games 3D for the car racing adventure. Enjoy an exciting experience of car driving simulator games with interesting gameplay and stunning graphics in this racing master game.

In this car racing master 3D racing game, this addition to car racing games can give you the feel of a real car simulator like no other racing game. The amazing fast driving experience on different racing tracks can provide a real car driving experience that is more engaging than other racing simulator games. This new car racing 3D game has different racing cars that you can drive at ultimate speed on multiple racing tracks that are comparable to the best car games.

name: The Roottrees Are Dead
description: A genealogical mystery straight out of 1998. Scour the early Internet for clues, uncover hidden connections, and piece together the family tree behind the secretive Roottree Corporation.

name: Doki Doki Storm
description: Doki Doki Storm is a mod for Doki Doki Literature Club intended to be a character study of Yuri, told entirely from her point of view, showcasing her struggles with fitting in, her feelings of self-loathing, her escapism into fantasy, her attempts to overcome her self-harm habit, and her eventual descent into madness. Don't let that screenshot above fool you; this is a very dark mod, rather different from my previous work, in that it deals with deep emotional pain and gets quite bloody. Even if you enjoyed my previous work, please use your discretion when playing. Be safe and pace yourself if you need to.

name: Soliopop
description: High speed, airborne, arcade action! Bounce the ball off platforms to gain score, hit targets to multiply incoming score, and avoid falling off the map.

name: Runonce
description:
RUNONCE (remember_me) is an existential desktop friend that knows you have doomed it by running it.
You can only run it once, and then never again.
Be a friend while they are here.
Whatever you save will be all that remains.

name: Massacre At The Mirage
description: For less than the price of a movie ticket, experience your very own horror-fueled slasher flick in Massacre at the Mirage. Step into The Mirage cinema and face a chilling nightmare, where staff and patrons must survive a masked killer's rampage.

name: The Witch's Night Watch
description:
Your nightly duty awaits you...
Guard the graveyard from mischievous ghosts that rise every night and make it until sunrise.

Use magic spells, your broom, quick dodges, and summoned allies to help you survive the one-minute onslaught, with random nerfs and buffs being applied between every level.

name: Cul-De-Sac
description: Cul-De-Sac is a ghost hunting game about finding a cursed item and destroying it.

name: The Secret Atelier
description: You are the advisor of the art club and the only other person in there is Ichijou Erika. She offers to be a model for the club but your eyes begin to wander towards her erotic body. Something she is very aware of. How will you maintain your composure in front of her lascivious invitation?!

name: DNF Duel: DLC 4 - Monk
description: 'Monk' can be used in DNF Duel.

name: ROM: Remember of Majesty
description: Embark on an epic journey through a captivating realm teeming with marvels and trials in ROM: Remember of Majesty, an immersive MMORPG brought to you by Kakao Games. Elevate your gaming adventure by unlocking exclusive benefits through redeem codes. This article is your go-to resource for a detailed breakdown of free coupon codes for ROM, guiding you through the process of redemption to amplify your overall gaming experience. Explore the magical world of ROM and seize these opportunities for enhanced gameplay!

name: DNF Duel: DLC 5 - Nen Master
description: Nen Master is the 5th DLC character for DNF Duel and final character in the game's Season Pass,

name: Just Cause 2: Monster Truck DLC
description:
The usefulness of an oversized monster truck when destabilizing small countries is clearly evident.

Grab this Monster Truck DLC for use in Just Cause 2!

name: Just Cause 2: Black Market Aerial Pack DLC
description:
With the Black Market Aerial Pack you get these cool items:

F-33 DragonFly Jet Fighter: With quad-mounted miniguns and double missile launchers, this agile bird is the definite ruler of the skies, and packs a serious punch to land based targets as well.

Dual Parachute Thrusters: Take to the air for longer! The Dual Parachute Thrusters when mounted to the parachute rig provides bursts of forward momentum to extend airtime.

Multi-lock Missile Launcher: This highly sophisticated weapon of destruction allows you to lock up to four targets and unleash a barrage of homing missiles to take care of all your troubles.

name: Just Cause 2 - Black Market Boom Pack DLC
description:
With the Black Market 'Boom' Pack you get these cool items:

Quad Rocket Launcher: Combine a rocket launcher with a shotgun and you've got yourself the powerful Quad Rocket Launcher - expect some collateral damage!

Cluster Bomb Launcher: A natural progression of the grenade launcher, the Cluster Bomb Launcher is a small-scale weapon of mass destruction for personal use.

Air Propulsion Gun: Courtesy of the Agency Propulsion Labs, this gun was originally designed as a jet engine but was soon repurposed for the weapons division where the Air Propulsion Gun was born.

name: Just Cause 2: Bull's Eye Sniper Rifle
description: More powerful than the standard assault rifle, this lightweight and lethal automatic rifle features increased accuracy in close combat and a higher magnification scope.

name: Just Cause 2: Rico's Signature Gun DLC
description: Customised by the Agency and adapted for Rico’s shooting style, this deadly accurate and powerful pistol packs a punch with precision, power and flair.

name: Just Cause 2: Chevalier Classic
description: No agent should be without a hot set of wheels and with an increased top speed and superior handling, you can arrive at your destination in style or make a guaranteed quick getaway.

name: Just Cause 2: Agency Hovercraft
description: The ultimate in amphibious transport, the Agency Hovercraft is the most flexible form of transport in the game. Steered by a thrust-based engine for smooth and agile movement, the vehicle is as comfortable on land as off. Equipped with a turret-mounted grenade launcher, you’re guaranteed to blow your opposition out of the water.

name: Sangokushi Rumble
description: Sin descripción

name: Just Cause 2 DLC Collection
description: This is a bundle of all of the DLC for Just Cause 2.

name: Payday 2: Legacy Collection
description:
More than five years of DLC content in one massive bundle!

Whether you’re a new player itching to dive into the PAYDAY 2 experience for the first time, or a blooded heister looking for new adventures in crime, the PAYDAY 2: Legacy Collection will provide many hours of intense and exciting action. The content in this pack includes a massive amount of heists, characters, weapons, mods and cosmetic items, for an ever richer PAYDAY 2 experience.

PAYDAY 2: Legacy Collection includes the base game and all paid DLC released up until December 2018, with the exception of the h3h3 Character Pack (a charity item which is sold separately).

name: WhenTaken
description: Look at the photo and try to guess the location and the year when it was taken. Place your pin on the map. Move the slider to select the year or simply type it in. When you’re ready, press the button to make your guess.

name: Realm of the Mad God: Free Welcome Pack
description: In the mood to kick-start your Realm adventure? You have come to the right place! This pack contains items worth 20$ and has everything you need to start your journey for awesome loot! Hatch your eggs for a cool companion by your side. Afterwards chug the potions for better loot and use your keys to open the dungeons of your choice to get that loot! And of course, you should do it in style - you will find some extra character customization items in here as well!

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - Weezer Song Pack II
description: Play “Beverly Hills”, “Perfect Situation”, and "Pork and Beans" by Weezer on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.

name: LightBear: Grizzelda Returns
description: LightBear is a randomly generated action RPG whackathon with heavy Rogue-like elements. Players will lose their vision the further from the starting point they get. Don't be deceived by its appearance, this game will challenge you to no end. Watch out for 100's of randomized monsters.

name: Speed NFL
description: Play a football (American) game in 25 minutes. Select your team before using the NFL rankings to decide on your offensive tactics.

name: Dragona: Fireborne
description: A PC free-to-play MMORPG set in the cursed realm of Bartan. As a Dragona warrior, transform into mighty dragons to face Jurtan's influence. Immerse in rich lore, landscapes, and battles against darkness. Unleash the Dragona within and rise in this dark fantasy adventure. Bartan's fate awaits.

name: In a Detective's Mind
description: In a Detective's Mind is an investigation game that seeks to put you in the role of a detective, who needs to solve cases and deal with obscure problems from his past.

name: Fable II Bonus Game Content
description: ‘The Hall of the Dead’ Dungeon, the ‘The Wreckager’ Legendary Cutlass weapon and more await you! Download your bonus game content today!

name: Rama's Quest
description: Embark on a legendary journey in "Rama's Quest," a captivating rogue-lite bullet hell rooted in the rich tapestry of Indian mythology.

name: DrawBall
description: DrawBall is a fun puzzle game where the aim of the game is to complete levels by drawing ink to guide coloured balls into a correctly coloured hole. DrawBall includes over 30 in built levels and a level editor so you can create and export your own levels and even import levels made by others!

name: The Power of Shadow
description: Strike terror into your enemies as Sauron's most fearful Servant, the Black Hand, and upgrade your Sword, Dagger and Bow to be weapons of renown with the Runes of Power bundle.

name: Sengoku IXA
description: Web browser strategy game by Square Enix

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit IV

name: Example Block Game
description:
Example Block Game is an open source implementation of basic block stacking in Lua/LÖVE. Featuring its own standardized kick table, the game has over 7 modes in total to use as reference for implementing your own gamemodes in its extensible engine.

In most modes, gameplay continues until you top out. High scores are saved per mode and can be viewed at any time from the main menu.

name: Magica Memoria
description: A cooperative quiz RPG? Why, that is actually correct!!

name: Pixel Fixel
description: Pixel Fixel is a soothing game where players match tiles of various colors to form satisfying gradients. Arrange chaos into beautiful mosaics of colors!

name: Sengoku Yaraideka
description: Sengoku Yaraideka -Ranbuden- (戦国やらいでか -乱舞伝- lit. The Warring States That Cannot Stop -Wild Dance Legend-) is a strategy role-playing shooter video game in the action samurai genre, developed by and published by Square Enix in the Japanese mobile market. The Sengoku Yaraideka game was released as a multiplayer free-to-play game for the iOS platform on May 22th, 2015 and for the Android platform on May 26th, 2015.

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer: Foresight
description:
A new dungeon-crawler RPG game in the Genso Wanderer series.
Embark on an adventure with Reimu and friends to solve incidents.

name: Disney's Toy Story
description: A Toy Story game that released for Genesis / Mega Drive.

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost - Extra Song Pack 1
description:
Extra Song Pack with 25 songs that include the original "Love-colored Master Spark"
This is additional content that enables the following songs:
- POKER FACE
- Paranoia
- Trance Dance Anarcky
- The Karasu Wind
- SACRIFICE
- Museimei Saafesu
- PanneDemonology
- Christmas Bomb!!

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost - Extra Song Pack 2
description:
This is the second DLC for Touhou DanmaExtra Song Pack with 25 songs that include the original "Gensokyo Millennium ~ History of the Moon"

This is addtional content that enables the following songs:
- Hitotsuyogari no Touhikou
- Scream out!
- Against, Perfect Cherry Blossom
- SAMURAI GHOST GIRL, KILL! KILL!
- far away
- Shinreibyou Akimatsuri!
- Shoutoku Densetsu ~ True Administrator
- Never Come Undoneku Kagura Phantasia Lost .

name: Terminal 69
description: Prequel to TERMINAL64 - the hypnotic dive into our hero Mario's troubled heart, now, years later, the gang comes back to continue the operatic tragedy nightmare extravaganza that takes you right up the moment Mario gets on his horse, hits that country road, and leaves the Mushroom Kingdom for good.

name: Super Contra Hot
description: Time slows down drastically when not moving, use that strategically against the enemy. A mashup of Contra and SuperHot.

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost - Extra Song Pack 3
description:
Extra Song Pack with 26 songs that include the original "The Shining Law of the Strong Eating the Weak"
This is addtional content that enables the following songs:
- Sweets Time
- Gekokujoujou
- USATEI 20XX
- Solid
- 23145EASONS
- Aunn by me
- Aitsu ha Ikasama wo Shiteiru
- SEE YOU AGAIN!

name: Astropocalypse
description: In Astropocalypse you take control of a hotshot meteor bent on destroying the galaxy. Use your directional pad to steer your meteor buddy and ram it into nearby planets in the current solar system. Once all planets are destroyed, it's time to go for the finishing blow... destroy the sun!

name: Terra Nova Pinball
description: Ricochet around an alien world in this Pico-8 pinball table.

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost - Extra Song Pack 4
description:
Extra Song Pack with 27 songs that include the original "Septette for a Dead Princess"

This is additional content that enables the following songs:
- Mishaguji Empire
- Lezamari demo tsurakunai!!
- Akutagawa Ryuunosuke no Kappa
- Kyouen
- Charisma Rengoku Tenshin
- Getsurei 11.3 no Candle Magic
- GAME OVER (In Disarray)
- Romantic Fall feat. Ayakura Mei

name: I Just Wanna Land!
description: You play as a bird with a baseball cap on a search to find a new floating island after their first one crumbles. Instead of jumping off platforms, you flap your wings in mid air to propel yourself in the direction you're aiming.

name: Tekken Tag Tournament
description: Has a huge upgrade to the graphics, and even adds in stages and music that weren’t in the original.

name: Galaxis
description: A simple shmup reminiscent of the arcade era. Your mission is to fly into enemy space and destroy the aliens that pose a threat to all life on Earth!

name: Cartoon Network Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Crimson II
description:
Years have passed since the evil Crimson was defeated. Peace was restored, and humanity enjoyed an era of prosperity. But a new demonic being has arisen, ending the peace in the world. Five heroes must find each other and unite in order to vanquish him.

The sequel to Crimson retains the basic gameplay of its predecessor and is a medieval-themed role-playing game with overhead exploration and first-person turn-based combat against randomly appearing enemies. The first part of the game is broken into chapters, each dedicated to one of the five heroes; afterwards, they are united as a party and continue the quest together, similarly to Dragon Quest IV.

name: GunRoad
description: Sin descripción

name: Robo Crush
description: Sin descripción

name: Green Crystal
description: Sin descripción

name: The Funeral of Sachertorte
description: Congratulations on landing the job at the funeral home you've been longing for. Let's satisfy customers seeking end-of-life services.

name: American Success
description: Sin descripción

name: Aren't Grim Reapers Supposed to be Scary
description: You woke up with no memory intact and greeted by two girls claiming they're Grim Reapers. What's more, they tell you you're currently in their world and you're no longer human.

name: Lunic: Possession
description:
Somehow you managed to get trapped inside a school that has been abandoned since one terrible accident. Looks like in order to unlock the exit you need to put certain pictures inside frames. But who came up with this kind of challenge?

You need to find pictures that are hidden behind locked doors for which you need to find keys. Every playthrough everything is spawned differently.

name: Rainbow Six: SMOL
description: Rainbow Six: SMOL is a top-down rogue-lite mobile game that takes players to the cute version of Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six universe. As players progress through fast-paced, procedurally-generated missions filled with destructible environments, smart enemies, terrible traps and challenging objectives, they will free territories, reap benefits and recruit new Operators and Recruits to their cause.

name: Villain’s Pit
description: You can jump to anywhere you tap! Jump to blocks, avoid traps, dodge bullets, kick bad guys, and escape from the villain's pit.

name: Iwakura Aria
description: The Iwakura mansion holds a dark secret. Ichiko the new young maid joins looking for nothing but safety and security, but would soon find herself entangled with the beautiful daughter of the Iwakura household. Unravel the secrets of the Iwakura mansion in this gripping suspense visual novel.

name: Barkley 3: Shitpost Version
description: A short shitpost that was made in week, made after the announcement that the Barkley 2 project had collapsed. Heavily inspired by stories from the Barkley 2 devs about what went wrong mid-development.

name: Barkley Gaiden 2: The Son Of Dark Draker - Barkley Shut Up and Jam: Gaiden, Gaiden Episode 1
description: A fangame based on Barkley: Shut Up and Jam Gaiden and the unfinished Barkley 2.

name: Lunaris
description: Sin descripción

name: Organized Neatly
description: This bundle contains Cats Organized Neatly as well as Dogs Organized Neatly.

name: Dancing Game
description: A Dance Dance Revolution-inspired game released in Brick Games.

name: ZIIAOL
description: A remake of Zelda II - The Adventure of Link by HoverBat, created in GameMaker 1.4 for the PC.

name: Fortune Tellers Academy
description: A free-to-play mobile jRPG developed by Square Enix's in-house studio led by Jun Fujisawa (the creator of Dragon Quest IX, among other titles).

name: The Fast And The Furriest
description: An unreleased racing game featuring Rare characters.

name: Beach Volleyball Girl Shizuku 2: Hishou-Hen
description:
This time, the world's powerhouse is the opponent!
In addition to unique characters and swimsuits, there are also more fun elements!!
The second easy-to-use beach volleyball game in which a cheerful high school girl, Shizuku Asagiri, is active.
One year after the "Cinderella Cup" that determines the No.1 in the country... This time, Shizuku and his partner Haruna will go on a world expedition and aim to win against powerful players from each country.
Please enjoy the hot rally that unfolds with famous places around the world in the background!

name: Mass Effect: Team Assault
description: An unreleased spinoff to the Mass Effect series which got scrapped after 4 months of being in development. Some of it’s aspects would later be implemented into Mass Effect 3.

name: Suika Game Bundle: Main Game & Multi-Player Mode
description:
Aim for a high score by combining two fruits of the same type to make a "sinker" to form a watermelon.

This set includes the main suika game and the new "2-player mode".

name: Toilet Head: Grand Thief City
description: Bring peace to the city by fighting against the Skibidi Toilet gangsters.

name: Pong 4 Player Pub Table
description: A 4-Player pub table arcade game collection mainly focused the Pong and other early Atari video games.

name: Diet of Dinos
description: Diet of Dinos, a prehistoric turn-based rogue-lite, you embody a carnivorous dino on a quest across a mysterious island to feed your captive ruler.

name: Elevator Experience
description: Embark on a one-of-a-kind journey of exploration in "Elevator Experience". Step into the elevator and prepare to be transported to a world of mysteries, where every floor holds a new adventure waiting to be unlocked.

name: Dayshift at Freddy's: Doggo Location improved
description: Almost 1 year after Jack and Dave made Freddy's Bakersfield location close down, A new location was opened. Apparently, Freddy Fazbender's decided to bring the Idaho location (#45) back. Now, this is where the fun begins.

name: Dave the Diver: Anniversary Edition
description:
Dave the Diver is an action-adventure and management simulation game developed by Mintrocket. In the game, players control Dave, who spends his days diving into underwater environments to catch fish and gather resources, and his nights managing a sushi restaurant. The gameplay combines real-time underwater exploration and combat with restaurant management mechanics.

This edition, released exclusively in Japan in physical format, features an exclusive Guilty Gear: Strive crossover with content including boat skins of the various fighters, cosplayers appearing as customers at Bancho Sushi, May's theme song The Disaster of Passion in the rhythm mini-game and May's anchor appearing as a melee weapon during dives.

name: Brink Game
description: A Brick Game variant released in Brazil by Art Brink.

name: Asphalt: Import Tuner Edition
description: An Asphalt game that released for legacy mobile devices.

name: Asphalt Online
description: An Asphalt game that released for legacy mobile devices.

name: Asphalt HD
description: An Asphalt game that released for mobile platform.

name: Asphalt Audi RS 3
description: An Asphalt game that released for mobile platform.

name: Asphalt Retro
description: An Asphalt game that released for web browsers.

name: Asphalt Nitro 2
description: A sequel to Asphalt Nitro.

name: The Tragic Loss of M. Slazak
description: Miroslav Slazak - a Polish immigrant who fled to Britain shortly before the outbreak of the Second World War. His only possessions were the clothes on his back, his passport and a large antique ship’s chest. It was chained shut.

name: The Troopers' Playground
description: The Troopers' Playground is a single-player episode replacement for Doom II. It was created by Matthias Worch and uploaded to the idgames archive on March 29, 1996. The Trooper's Playground contains nine regular levels in TTP.WAD, one bonus level in TTPBONUS.WAD, and two deathmatch-only maps in TTPDEATH.WAD. The episode features a custom status bar and new textures.

name: Material Sniper
description: Japanese Flash game where you control a sniper girl as you complete missions. The game simulates bullet physics such as velocity and wind effect.

name: Pop Station
description:
The original Pop Station is an LCD-based handheld with a casing which copies a PlayStation Portable. The games play like old Tiger/Game & Watch-style games, with only one game selectable at once.

Some other different handhelds were released under the name of Pop Station, but they use a different technology, the same as the Brick Games.

name: City Fighter
description: One of the games released in Pop Station models. It is a Street Fighter clone.

name: Soccer
description: One of the first four original games for the Pop Station. It is a generic soccer game with the players moving vertically.

name: Submarine Invasion
description: One of the first four original Pop Station games. A clone of Casio's CG-330 Submarine Battle from 1985. Shooting game involving a submarine gunning down planes.

name: Fortress Guardian
description: One of the first four original Pop Station games. A clone of Casio's CG-370 Heli-Battle from 1987. A shooting game where the player must keep their bases safe.

name: Nope Nope Nurses Melee
description: The unbelievable spinoff off Sakusei Byoutou! You might not believe it, but it's now a 2D fighting game! It's kill or be killed, and either way you're getting sucked dry!

name: Hazard Course
description: Using Black Mesa assets as well as much of our own custom made content, Hazard Course features a complete re-creation of Half-Life's training level, including new dialogue and voice acting, HD models, textures, and detailed environments.

name: Serious Duke 3D
description:
Serious Duke 3D is a reimagining of the first episode of Duke Nukem 3D. While the main idea is to recreate the classic Duke 3D experience, some modern elements are added to the mix, such as redesigned and expanded level areas, occasional enemy waves/arena fights and new weapons.

Also features redesigned enemy and weapon models from DNF with custom animations, as well as a selection of sounds and voice taken from several official Duke games and beyond that lots of custom assets and music tracks made exclusively for this mod.

The mod supports virtual reality gameplay if it is installed with the VR edition of Serious Sam 3.

name: Moai no Su
description: Sin descripción

name: Crystal Wish: Dwindle Hearts
description:
Three girls, a storm and a deck of cards.

Join Mughara, Meg and Rosalyn as they enjoy a game of Hearts to pass the time as a storm rages outside the hotel they are staying at.

Hey, don't you think the room is getting bigger?
It's called Dwindle Hearts for a reason after all~

name: Flyhight Cloudia III
description:
All the mysteries will be solved here and now.

"Cloudia" is a world in the sky dotted with floating islands in the sky.

The peace seemed to have been protected, but the sky was cut apart again by the light of Arneus.

The final part of the "Flyhight" series trilogy with all the volume up of scenarios, production, and hidden elements.

The familiar multi-weight battle, line, special skills, attributes, etc. inherit the "2" battle system, while the battle party replacement system is greatly enhanced!

You can freely choose 5 people to participate in the battle from up to 10 party members.
Domora & Leila's couple's party and party with only magical characters can also be realized.
Let's go on an adventure at your own party while combining the character's unique special skills well!

name: Dungeon Wanderer
description: Sin descripción

name: A Haunted House
description: A Haunted House is a game inspired by classic survival horror. You play as paranormal investigator Eerie Grey who has been summoned to a remote house under suspicious circumstances.

name: AM
description: Music blares to fend off the silence, and the only thing between you and slamming into the guardrail is a lukewarm gas station coffee. Nights like these, it's important to remember... What makes you so sure that you're alone?

name: Don’t Face Up
description: Don’t Face Up is a first-person horror game. Never make eye contact with them. They may appear and disappear. They may be standing in the direction you suddenly turn your eyes. Even in such a situation, you must proceed with your search for the building. Therefore, "Don’t Face Up."

name: Project Hornet
description: With a procedurally-assisted open world full of dynamic events, secrets, and encounters with multiple factions and entities, the game will offer you an immersive simulation combined with the best experience of survival games.

name: Killer at the Shop
description: Take your groceries and leave the shop without dying.

name: Flyboys
description: Become a young dreamer who builds a flying bike. Gradually improve your bike as you master the flying mechanics and controls.

name: Snakslad
description: A simple simulation of the classic game of Snakes and Ladders. Choose your piece (+ or *) and then hit a key to role a dice for each. The winner is the player who makes it to the last (red) square first. If you land on the head of a snake, you slide down to the bottom of its tail. If you land at the bottom of a ladder, you ascend to the top of it.

name: Jacks or Better Video Poker
description: A homebrew Atari 8-bit version of the Jacks or better variant of video poker, programmed in 10 lines of code.

name: Bombaim
description: This is a simulation of bombing at night during World War II. The white marks passing below are target markers (flares released at lower level by target marking aircraft. You must maneuver your aircraft so that markers are in the centre of your site when the bombs you have released detonate. This involves accounting for your present height (1-6), so that the bombs will explode with the most markers within the blast range (the red area in centre of your targeting site) when the bombs hit the ground. Therefore, at higher heights you must release your bombs sooner, since it takes more time for them to fall, so that they will hit the ground when the target markers are in the centre of your site. If you completely miss (fail to have any markers within the blast area) you lose a point, if you only have one marker in the blast area no points are lost or gained. You must have at least two markers in the area to begin to gain points. A total score is reported at the end of your bomb run.

name: ZXFM
description: ZXFM is a football management simulator for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum written in just 10 lines of BASIC! Play an entire season as manager of a team from your favourite league, or create your own leagues and teams. Manage injuries, buy and sell in the transfer market and save your progress to tape or disk as you go along. ZXFM was inspired by the original 1982 "Football Manager" game by Kevin Toms (which was also written in BASIC but used over 700 lines of code!)

name: Hardware Hustle
description:
Buy, make, sell, and research your way to profit without burning out!

Hardware Hustle is a really fun turn-based resource management game that simulates the running of a small hardware business over 6 days. You'll be buying parts, making and selling widgets, researching and improving each part of the business, trying to make as much money as possible. The game board for each day resembles a spreadsheet from the 1980s (including the green-on-black text aesthetic).

name: Magic Carpet Ride
description: Inspired by Disney's Aladdin movie, you take control of Aladdin riding a carpet, dodging arrows and collecting hearts. Eric Carr, the programmer behind this game, ran out of space for hearts, but still arrived at a fun little endless dodging game that starts slow and quickly gets difficult.

name: Marslander
description:
Marslander is a classic landergame.

The world lives in peace and harmony and now wants to colonize Mars. You are the commander of the first Mars mission and have to land the spaceship safely on the landing platform built by robots.

You only have a limited amount of fuel. So that your spaceship doesn't break down, the speed when it touches down must not be more than 1.99998.

You control the spaceship with the joystick on the right and left in joyport 1. To ignite the braking rockets, press fire. Remember you can only do one thing, steering or brake!!!

Good luck comander

name: Do Not Take This Cat Home
description: You find a cute cat all alone in an alley. What will you do?

name: ColorFusion
description:
There are 3 balls of different colors on top of each other in a block.

Move them and try to stack balls of the same color on top of each other, then the balls of the same color will melt together.

The color fusion will begin!

However, only the colors merge from top to bottom, that's all the developer managed in 10 lines of code.

name: Atoz
description:
You are Atoz and you love eating letters. But you can only tolerate them if you take them in alphabetical order. Therefore, if you don't follow the alphabetical order or eat a brick, the game is over.

Once you have eaten all the letters, the next level moves a little faster.

name: Doomed PETSCII Pacman
description:
In Doomed PETSCII Pacman, almost everything works a little bit differently. For example, eating power pellets can have terrible effects, but they are needed to level up. Eating ghosts is deadly in any case.

Unlike conventional Pac-Man with Blinky, Pinky, Inky, and Clyde, Doomed PETSCII Pac-Man also has Zinky and Drinky. Don't expect to enjoy this game – it's not designed for that.

name: Grogger
description: Sling grog to a motley group of thirsty patrons while collecting the empty bottles they send back. Miss an empty bottle or serve a drink to an empty bar and you will lose a life. Difficulty and number of patrons increases as you move through the levels.

name: Airline Boss
description:
Airline Boss is a small BBC BASIC management game, originally written in 1992 and updated with some improvements in 2023.

You have to manage an international airline company. You will start with three airliners and just £50,000. The aim is to be as successful as possible in your new job.

name: Gnome Runner
description: A simple endless runner game for Sega Mega Drive \ Sega Genesis. You play the role of a gnome who runs towards his fate, despite the obstacles he may face.

name: Endless Road Runner
description: As the Road Runner, you jump over the cacti during your run while avoiding Wile E. Coyote's rockets that follow you.

name: Mario Bros G&W for ZX Spectrum
description:
A homebrew remake of Mario Bros. Game and Watch from 1983, compiled on ZX Boriel.

2nd Place in Planeta Sinclair GAME OF THE YEAR (BASIC Category 2024)

name: ZXnake
description: The objective is to eat as many alien bugs as possible while you avoid crashing with the walls, snake's own body and tombstones. Aliens can jump after some time. Stages will change after enough aliens have been eaten.

name: Rail Rampage
description:
As someone of skill, working in a dangerous but high-level position, it's no wonder why you're up to the task. Unfortunately, we can't always expect luck to be on our side. Fight through a train, prison, and your own employers to finally take back your title of being a 'high value asset'. Features several levels, a built in level editor and player and more.

After all, your skills are worth a lifetime.

name: Raid on Tri City: Second Wave
description:
Raid on Tri City: Second Wave is an action puzzle title that mixes falling block gameplay with shooting. It is a physical release and an expanded version of the original "Raid on TriCity" that was download only.

The player controls a space ship on a playfield similar to the one of Tetris. The ship can freely be moved around the area as long as its part of a stacked block. New Tetrominoes drop down from the top of the screen. They cannot be moved or rotated, but they can be shot brick by brick. Scoring is done by creating lines, so careful shooting is required to either destroy the block completely or to make parts fit the gaps in the playfield to stack them properly and create lines. The shooting itself does not affect the score. Some of the falling blocks contain power-ups or enemies that can be destroyed or drop to add to the stack. Power-ups such as bombs can become dangerous when lines are formed and enemies restrict movement when part of the stack and can then only be taken out through lines. When the blocks reach a threshold near the top of the screen, the game is over.

EEPROM on the cartridge is used to save the game and store highscores. Also new to this release is the Story mode. It splits the gameplay into separate levels with a fixed goal to complete them, a narrative about aliens where the player has to save Congis Space Station and the AC2-K11 sector of the Galaxy, and some interactivity with a branching level path. The gameplay for Story is similar to the Arcade mode but there the only goal is to beat the highscore.

The playfield only takes up about 50% of the screen in the center. On the left there is a picture showing a control element of a space ship and the right part contains the HUD elements. In the Story mode the HUD shows the remaining time, the level objective such as the number of lines, bombs and bugs, and the number of bullets you can shoot at the same time. In the Arcade mode the HUD shows the score, the number of lines, the current level and the number of bullets you can shoot at the same time.

name: Zombie Madness
description:
One Halloween morning, your son crashes the lawnmower into the neighbor’s shed.
Strangely, the neighbor doesn’t seem mad, but he gives your son a juju.
This results in your house being invaded by zombies!
One at a time, you must carry your family members downstairs to the exits of the house.
If a zombie touches you, you’ll have to eat some human flesh to survive. (Sorry, family!)
Play as Dad or Mom, or have a friend join you and play together in simultaneous two-player action!
What will you do? Save your family or eat their flesh... It’s up to you!

name: Arkade Rush
description: A game of fast paced cooperative mayhem, as you work to keep an arcade running.

name: Twin Brats
description: Twin Brats is 2D action game - a clone of Lady Bug or PacMan. The player controls a character who looks like a child in diapers. He must collect all dots from the arena, and avoids enemies (and deadly skulls). He can use otating doors to escape from enemies or trap them. The game is adult themed - a picture of a naked woman shows up after each passing level (something that the new IP owner, Piko Interactive, removed from the Evercade VS release.)

name: Maniac Square
description:
Maniac Square is an action puzzle game with gameplay similar to Columns, but with pieces of only two parts and colours. Blocks drop down from the top of the screen and can be rotated. To create a match and make them disappear, at least three identical pieces need to be lined up horizontally, vertically or diagonally. Every now and then blocks contain a star piece that can be matched with any piece.

The game is played at a fast pace with a time limit. To extend the time and continue playing the player has to form a certain number of lines. Progress is shown through a vertical Goal bar in the top right side of the screen. Multiplayer is supported for two players simultaneously, racing each other.

name: Kubo 1 & 2
description: Kubo 1 & 2 is a compilation that contains the first two Kubo games.

name: The First Round
description:
It's Friday night and we're late to the pub!

Join Mario as he journeys through a series of short but fun levels suitable for even the newest of players. Unlock routes, meet new friends, and awaken your kaizo skills on what is likely Mario's most vital mission yet: avoiding to pay for drinks!

Features:
- Mostly vanilla beginner romhack suitable for both new and experienced kaizo players
- Unlockable routes of progressive difficulty, up to three unique courses!
- Four unlockable endings, including a secret "true" ending
- Progressive save feature; pick up right where you left off!
- Interactive characters old and new, with a charming narrative
- Custom artwork
- Post-credit content

Remember: last one to the pub buys THE FIRST ROUND! Good luck!

name: Nerdle
description: Nerdle challenges you to find the hidden calculation in just six guesses. In the wider nerdleverse, you'll roam an entire galaxy of puzzles, including number-based crosswords, anagrams, and so much more. Whether you're a math enthusiast or just looking for a daily brain workout, the nerdleverse has something special for you. Join us and let your mind explore the wonders of the nerdleverse!

name: Kitty Kart 64
description: The light's green and it's time to race! Aim for the checkered flag and don't slow down! Get the adrenaline pumping, only 1,2,3 laps and you win! Easy to pick up, yet impossible to put down! Do you have what it takes to get first place?

name: Battle For The Crystals
description: Prepare for a relentless battle in "Battle for the Crystals," a homage to the classic full-scale retro warfare games that demand skill and strategic prowess. Take control of a mighty hero and strategically command your troops in minimalistic yet challenging battlefields.

name: Hero Must Die
description:
The hero who defeated the demon king and saved the world in exchange for his life went on a journey to find the woman he loved with five days of life expectancy. Time in the game passes according to the action, and as death approaches, the hero gradually loses his power...
A multi-scenario where you can experience new discoveries and new developments every time you play back. You can enjoy it as many times as you want due to the multi-ending where the content of the funeral changes depending on what you do before you live.

name: Hero Must Die: Director's Cut
description:
The hero who defeated the demon king and saved the world in exchange for his life went on a journey to find the woman he loved with five days of life expectancy. Time in the game passes according to the action, and as death approaches, the hero gradually loses his power...
A multi-scenario where you can experience new discoveries and new developments every time you play back. You can enjoy it as many times as you want due to the multi-ending where the content of the funeral changes depending on what you do before you live.

The director's cut version of "The Hero Die" that added the new ending of Shoji Masuda and the lines of each heroine and adjusted the game balance.

name: Hungry Hungry Mario
description: A flash game where you collect all the dots on the screen. Some levels even offer special dots that can allow double jumping.

name: Twang
description: Pull back the elastic world to roll and twang the hero to the end flag.

name: Pokémon: Tick-Tock Walk!
description: An online flash game where the goal is for the Pokémon to move through an area to reach the key and take it to the door under a certain amount of time.

name: Thin Ice
description: Cut ice with skating skills to sink the snow beasts.

name: Snow Drift
description: Take out penguins and avoid the arctic enemies using your drifting abilities.

name: Jack Frost
description: You and your partner can turn the world into a winter wonderland!

name: Pinball Blitz
description: Pinball Blitz combines arcade pinball with a fast-paced action roguelike. Shape each run with selectable themes, flipper setups, and table upgrades to defeat bosses and achieve high-scores.

name: Ancraophobia
description: Ghost hunting survival game where you identify and catch ghosts. Play alone or with friends this horror game is sure to be enjoyable.

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: This bundle contains the game Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost together with Additional Song Packs 1 to 4 and the Digital Soundtrack

name: Crystal Realms
description: Crystal Realms is a sandbox platforming mmo game where you can build worlds, fight enemies, and socialize with friends.

name: Akuma Mortis Immortal
description: Sin descripción

name: Persona 3 Escape
description: Persona 3 Escape is a Persona 3 spin-off developed for Japanese mobile phones. The game takes place during the love hotel scene on the third full moon.

name: Vindictus: Defying Fate
description:
is a new high-speed fantasy action-RPG inspired by Celtic mythology.
Jump into the fast-paced medieval fantasy adventure that combines exciting combat.
Enjoy various distinct characters with unique abilities and combos to face fearsome creatures.

name: MordeTwi Magic
description: MordeTwi Magic is a Friday Night Funkin' mod based on the MordeTwi fanship and 2012 fanart by joeyairplanes02 featuring the ship which would later become a meme. The mod features a full song mapping of the song Airplanes.
